182a8(mdo sde): pa sngon chad yongs su ma spyad pa'i sems can de dag gis rigs sngags kyi rten lung ston pa chen po 'di thos na yang / yon+tan de lta bu de dag thob par 'gyur ro// thos pa tsam gyi mod la/ 
182b1(mdo sde): yang de dag gi las kyi sgrib ba dpag tu med pa ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gis kyang der chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mtha' dag bri bar bya'o// yang dag par
182b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po dag gi sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bdun yang bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i nyan thos chos kyis gnas pa rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba yang bya'o// 
182b3(mdo sde): der sbyin bdag kyang rab tu gzhag par bya'o// dus dus su gso sbyong gi sdom pa la yang mngon par brtson par bya'o// chos mnyan par bya'o// der sems can gang dag dkon mchog
182b4(mdo sde): gsum la dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po de lta bu 'thob pa'i gnas de yod de/ de dag gis ga/ dang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por ngan song gsum
182b5(mdo sde): du sdug bsngal drag po rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyurab de yang ris 'thun par 'di nyid la mi 'dod pa'i 'dra/ sa bu mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig la ni yun
182b6(mdo sde): ring du nad 'byung ste/ des de'i sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las 'phangs pa dag kyang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni yan lag bcad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig
182b7(mdo sde): gi nor zad pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni 'khor zhig pas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral bas/ yongs su
182b8(mdo sde): zad par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni 'khor dang bran dang / lus la gnod pa byed pa dang / btson rar bzhag pas yongs su zad por 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni mi snyan pa dang
183a1(mdo sde): zhes par smra ba tshag thos pas yongs su zang bar 'gyur te/ ris 'thun pa la de dag gis mi dge ba'i las sngodan byas pa rnams yongs su 'das
183a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rigs sngags kyi gzhi lung ston pa chen po 'don de ltar don che ba yin no// tat+t+wathA/ khag pa ni ts+tsheng / gad+hu ra k+Sha se/ gar+b+ha re bing dra/ pra b+ha ga k+She/ k+Sha
183a3(mdo sde): / hrI ShA// min gyi She/ sa ma men+ta dr-iH/ armA sa d+he/ !b+hU dang / nes nA d+h+ya/ sam d+d+ha d+h+weShe/ ba dz+ra r+dz+dza/ \u0f7f
183a4(mdo sde): satwa dza badz+rA She/ so'i n+ya badz+nyAShe/ sa li la ku rbAdz+dzaShadas li ku h+ya bIk+She pa Ni ko she/ sad+ha na ko ni/ sa bad+ha nan daM b+he/ ba'i tro pra brid taM/ u pa kra ma Na thai/ an ts+tshe d+ya pra la/ pra ta
183a5(mdo sde): kra me Na/ se khe b+he she/ sa lo tsan pa me/ kro d+ha d+hA ri kI shas she/ A sha kha g+he/ na ya kun dze/ bi dra ba ne/ kla na pa naM/ u b+ha ba ne/ sa ma ma ka re/ shA ri ya ba ne/ mo g+hadz+dzA she/ ha
183a6(mdo sde): na ba na ya na mu khe/ sA rak+Sha ko le/ nA rA ye ni dz+nyA She/ in dra ba sa ne/ oM a/ a ba A/ a ra ba ha/ dzA rA/ e ra ba sa me ga du khin sti ra Ni ni rbo ha sahU/ rigs kyi bu rigs sngags kyi
183a7(mdo sde): rten lung ston pa chen po 'di ni yon+dan che ba/ phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad la phan byed pa/ khrus byed pa/ snang bar byed pa/ dran par byed pa/ nye bar zhi bar byed pa yin te/ 
183a8(mdo sde): de la gang dag sems rtse gcig pas nyan par byed cing / ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sgrub par byed pa'i sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par
183b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / rkyen gyi rgyal ba thams cad dang / dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag tham
183b2(mdo sde): cad ni lha'i dbang po nas mi'i dbang po'i bar gyis bsams pa dang / dang bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / phyag bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa dang / mchod pa'i 'os su gyur pa yin no// shin
183b3(mdo sde): tu bsrung bar bya ba'i 'os su gyur pa yin no// sems can de dag ni phyi ma'i dus na/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rnam par shes pa tha ma la/ phyogs bcu kun nas mdun na sangs rgyas bcom
183b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang / de la phyag rkyong bar ma dadzad cing / 'di skad du kye yon+dan gyis phyug pa dag tshur
183b5(mdo sde): shig/ nged kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par/ gnas par shig/ der nged kyis khyed sa bcu dgal gzhag par bya'o// zhes kyang gsung bar mdzad do// 
183b6(mdo sde): de sangs rgyas mthong ba'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dad pa 'phags pa des 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing zhing stong pa ma yin pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur
183b7(mdo sde): zhing / de der yang sa bcu dag 'thob par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ rigs sngags kyi rten lung ston
183b8(mdo sde): pa chen po 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las zad par bya ba dang rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba dang / byang grol gyi bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir/ de ltar don che ba dang / phan yon che ba yin gyis// 
184a1(mdo sde): long la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su song shig/ nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la yang zhus shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
184a2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so// yang de'i tshe 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
184a3(mdo sde): po grangs med dpag tu med pas kyang tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba
184a4(mdo sde): dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po de yang dang blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sem
184a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi las bas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngag thos par 'tshal te/ bdag cag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas ring po ma lags/ snga ma yang
184a6(mdo sde): kun phyin lags na btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bdag cag kyang mchi bar gnang bar mdzad par gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs
184a7(mdo sde): rgyal po des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed cag thams cad lhan cig 'thun par sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang / rtags dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod la
184a8(mdo sde): dang / cha byad kyis khyed deng shig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lags so zhes kyang gsol te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal byang chub sems
184b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang / lhan cig cig tu sred med kyi bu'i mdog dang / rtags dang / gzugs dang / dbyibs dang / spyod lam dang / cha byang du bdag nyid mngon par
184b2(mdo sde): sprul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ de nas chas te
184b3(mdo sde): yud tsam gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der phyin te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir de dag phyin pa tsam gyi mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du/ bcom ldan
184b4(mdo sde): 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ 'dzam bu'i chu dbo'i gser gyi char pa mngon par rab tu phab bo//  de dag gling bzhi pa bar ma 'di ga la ba dang / yul ma ga d+ha'i/ 
184b5(mdo sde): zhing ga la ba de logs su dong ste/ dong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// bcom
184b6(mdo sde): ldan 'das ni nga dung yang rgyal po gzugs can snying po dang thabs gcig chos kyis gnas pa'i gtam rab tu mdzad do// yang de'i tshe byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma/ 
184b7(mdo sde): snying 'das pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing spos thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gnas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs
184b8(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems
185a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i
185a2(mdo sde): snying pos/ steng gi na mkha' la bltas so// des kyang der na mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pa/ byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas/ lho
185a3(mdo sde): phyogs su 'dong ba mthong bar gyur to// des lho phyogs su rnam par bltas te snang ba chen po mthong nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
185a4(mdo sde): ba rab tu btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun bu bcom ldan 'das bdag ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor las langs nas/ ring po ma lags te/ bdag gis ni stong
185a5(mdo sde): gi na mkha' la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ po grangs ma mchis/ dpag tu ma mchis pa byang // phyogs kyi phyogs cha nas/ lho phyogs su mchi ba dag
185a6(mdo sde): mthong lags so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs su rnam pas bltas te/ snang ba chen po mthong nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la rgyu ni gang lags snyam lagaso/ 
185a7(mdo sde): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi
185a8(mdo sde): zhing 'di nas lho phyogs kyi phyogs chan sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ 'di ltar sdigs ma lnga dang / 
185b1(mdo sde): ldan par gnas pa de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la 'dus pa chen po la
185b2(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gi chos kyis gnas pa rgyun mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir/ da ltar theg pa gsum gyi rnam par
185b3(mdo sde): gtan la dbab pa bstan pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs rab tu ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der bdud kyi yul rnam par gzhig pa dang / dri ma med par mdzad pa'i phyir dang
185b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i phyir dang / chos kyi tshul yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dus dang chen po byung bar gyur to// der yang de bzhin gshegs
185b5(mdo sde): pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i rtog gi gzungs sngags gsu ngas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su spyad nas/ gshegs so// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
185b6(mdo sde): de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams kyi 'dus pa chen po yang dag par sgrub par mdzad de/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / 
185b7(mdo sde): yang dag par ldan pa mig gsum pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan kyang / de na dung sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed sa dang / nam mkha'i gang ba zhig de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa mchog tu
185b8(mdo sde): snyan par gsung ba'i chos bstan pas tshig par ma gyur to// mchog tu snyan pa gsung ba shAkya thub pa de yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i
186a1(mdo sde): yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las zang par byed pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par bzhed do// de bzhin gshegs/ 
186a2(mdo sde): pa de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ phyogs bcu dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bskal pa brgyas nges par byung ba zhes bya ba nas gang dag
186a3(mdo sde): srid pa tha ma pa sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa dag 'di'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du/ 
186a4(mdo sde): 'jug par gyur cig/ 'dir 'khod nas kyang rang rang dgi phyogs kyi bsam gtan dag gis gnas par gyur cig/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sa chen po lhag tu
186a5(mdo sde): mthu dang ldan pa dang / bcud dang ldan pa dang / yon+tan dang / ldan pa dag tu gyur cig/ 'di ltar 'dir sangs rgya sa kyi zhing gzhan bzhin du thams cad dran pa dang ldan pa dag dang / 
186a6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dag dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dag dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dag tu gyur cig/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag phyogs bcu'i
186a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag nas yang dag par zhugs pa de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i nang du chud par gyur cig/ de nyid du 'khod nas kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs la stobs
186a8(mdo sde): ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du 'khod nas/ bsam gtan byed par gyur cig snyam dgongs so// bsam gtan byed pa de dag kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu dper na/ 'bru
186b1(mdo sde): mar gyi mar me lta bu byung ngo // zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gi lus las 'od 'di lta bu dper na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya stong mang po'i 'od lta bu byung ngo // zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyararo// 
186b2(mdo sde): de na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// da ltar gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
186b3(mdo sde): zhing thams cad na snyoms par zhugs par gyur la/ sngon chad der phyin pa ni ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ da ltar ting nge 'dzin las lags nas
186b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der chas so// der phyin nas kyi rang de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'dus pa chen po de yang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de
186b5(mdo sde): yang thos par 'gyur ro// skyil mo krung du 'dug nas/ rang rang gi dge ba'i phyogs kyi bsam gtan rnam pa sna/ tshogs kyis rtse bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang
186b6(mdo sde): da ltar ting nge 'dzin las langs kyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der 'gro bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed de na/ yang sems can dag
186b7(mdo sde): mchog tu tshe thung ba dag yin/ nad mang ba dag yin/ blo chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba kun tu spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ bsod nams chung ba dag yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
186b8(mdo sde): bya ba tshol ba chung ba dag yin/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag yin/ longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa chung ba dag yin/ 'dod pa la chums pa dag yin/ mi dge
187a1(mdo sde): pa spyod pa dag yin/ phrag dog dang ldan pa dag yin/ ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa spangs pa dag yin te/ de dag phal cher mi dge ba bcu'i las kyis lam/ 
187a2(mdo sde): yang dag par blangs pas ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na gang dag 'dren mar spyod pa'i sems can yod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ de nyid du sdig pa byed pa'i
187a3(mdo sde): gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ sdig pa byed pa'i lus srul po zhes bya ba'i bar dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te/ sdig pa byed pa'i gnod sbyin zhes bya ba nas/ lus srul po zhes bya ba'i
187a4(mdo sde): bar de dag kyang / der sa'i bcud kyi mdangs phrogs nas yongs su spyod par byed do// 'bru dang / sman dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / 'dab ma dang / ro rnams kyi
187a5(mdo sde): mdangs phrogs nas kyang yongs su spyod par byed do// de na sa stobs dang ldan pa dag yin no// der de dag mang lan gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi mdangs dag 'phrog par byed do// 
187a6(mdo sde): mi rnams skyes pa tsam gyi mod dag 'phrog par byed do// 'o ma'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// bza' ba dang / btung ba'i mdangs dag kyang 'phrog par byed do// der de dag
187a7(mdo sde): gis mi mngal du zhugs pa'i mdangs phrogs shing skyes pa tsam gyi mod la mdangs phrog pas de dag kyang mdangs la mi reg cing / bza' ba dang / btung ba nyams pa/ yongs su spyad zin
187a8(mdo sde): pa la yongs su spyod par byed do// rgyu des de na mi rnams mchog tu na bdag dang / tshe thung ba dag dang / dran pa nyams pa dag dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las yongs su nyams
187b1(mdo sde): ba dag dang / bsod nams dang bral ba dag dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par mi lta ba dag dang / longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral ba dag dang / 'dod pa la chums pa dag
187b2(mdo sde): dang / kun spyod pa mi gtsang ba dag yin// zhes bya ba nas/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pas/ ngan song du 'gro ba dag yin no zhes bya ba'i bar yin no// rigs kyi/ 
187b3(mdo sde): bu sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam 'di lta bur gyur te/ 'di ltar nga bya ba la brtson pa dang / spro ba dang brtul ba brtan par gyur to// sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
187b4(mdo sde): rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa ngas bsnyen bkur byas so// ngas thabs gang dag gis bud med sbrum ma bsrung bar nus pa yang yongs su zhus so// nga'i brtson 'grus gang gis ma bde legs su
187b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / mngal na yod pa bde legs su 'gyur/ ba yang yongs su zhus so// lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ na mkha' lding ngam
187b6(mdo sde): mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ grul bum 'am/ yi dgas sam/ sha za'am/ srul po 'am/ lus srul po 'am/ mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ brjed byed/ 
187b7(mdo sde): dam rigs nyin gcig pa'am/ nyin gnyis pa'am/ nyin gsum pa 'am/ nyin bzhi pa 'am/ ro langs gang yang dug gam/ sngags kyi sbyor ba 'am/ sman gyi sbyor
187b8(mdo sde): bas lus dang sems la gnod par bya ba mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gis kyang ma 'am/ mngal na yod pa dang / skyes ma thag pa dang / 'o ma 'thung ba dang / bza' ba
188a1(mdo sde): dang / btung ba yongs su spyod pa la gnod par bya ba mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gis kyang mdangs phrog pa 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams
188a2(mdo sde): dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya ba mi nus pa yongs su zhus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag tha mal par mngal na gnas pa yongs su zhus so// lus dang sems la rnam
188a3(mdo sde): par tho ma btsams par bde bar mI mngal nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar 'o ma mthung ba yongs su zhus so// bde bar bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su
188a4(mdo sde): spyad pa yongs su zhus so// gnod pa chung ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / blo dang ldan pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge rab bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs pa'i bar dang / 
188a5(mdo sde): sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa la/ mngon par dga' ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba yin pa dag kyang yongs su zhus// 
188a6(mdo sde): ngos gsang sngags gang dag dang / sman gang dag gis sems can de lta bu dag yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i spyod pa'i gsang sngags de dag ni gang yin/ sman de dag ni gang yin zhe
188a7(mdo sde): na/ gzugs sngags gang gis ngas sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa/ rig pa yod pa'i
188a8(mdo sde): sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi bzhi'i gzungs sngags lung bstan pa chen po 'di sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang ngastan par gyur to// rtag tu brtson 'grus dang / 
188b1(mdo sde): brtul ba brtan pa ngas rtag par rgyun tu tshe rabs de dang / de dag tu mngal na bu yod pa'i bud med la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba/ gzungs sngags gsang sngags kyi gzhi rigs sngags
188b2(mdo sde): 'dis bsrung ba byas so// bud med de mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te/ skyabs gsum la rnam par gzhag go// phyin chad kyang lha 'am zhes bya ba nas/ bdud dam/ brjed byed
188b3(mdo sde): ngam/ mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gyis/ ma'i mngal na bu yod pa dang bcas te/ rnam par tho ba tsam pa 'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams
188b4(mdo sde): dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug par bya bar mi nus so// lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar gyis kyang mdangs 'phrog pa 'am/ sman dang sngags kyi sbyar ba
188b5(mdo sde): bya bar mi nus so// de dag gis mngal na bu yod pa'i man ma par tho ma btsams na/ ma rnam par tho ma btsam sa pa dang / mngal na bu gnas pa yang sngon gyi tshe rabs
188b6(mdo sde): dran par 'gyur ro// nying mtshams sbyor ba'i lus kyis dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gzugs bzang ba blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan
188b7(mdo sde): bdag dang / shin tu blo dang ldan pa dag bde legs su ma'i lto nas byung zhing brjed ngas pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag tu gyur to// de dag skyes pa tsam gyi mod la yang lha stobs dang ldan/ 
188b8(mdo sde): dbang che bar grags pa re re la yang 'khor brgya stong yod pa dag bsrung ba dang / rjes su sba bar byed par kun tu gnas so// de dag mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang gis kyang rnam par/ 
189a1(mdo sde): tho ba tsam pa'am/ rnam par gtse ba 'am/ lus dkrug pa 'am/ khams dkrug pa 'am/ sems dkrug pa bya bar mi nus so// mdangs blangs par yang mi nus
189a2(mdo sde): so// gsang sngags dang sman gyis kyang rnam par tho ba tsam par mi nus so// gang gi phyir sems can de dag mchog tu gzungs dang dran pa dang tshe rabs dran pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs/ 
189a3(mdo sde): par lta ba dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang ldan pa dang / gtong ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims la rjes su dga' ba dang / bzod pa dang / yod+han dang
189a4(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / dben pa la dga' zhing ba sam gtan la mngon par brtson pa dang / dge ba'i gshe/ sa gnyen la mngon par dga' ba dag dang / de thob par
189a5(mdo sde): byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gro ba/ 'phags pa'i nges par 'byin pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa/ dag tu gyur to// sems can nye bar zhi ba la gnas pa
189a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa chung ba de lta bu de dag la/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis rim gror bya bar brtson pa dag yin te/ mi de dag kyang mchog tu 'khor ba la skyon tu lta ba dang / byang grol gyi
189a7(mdo sde): bde ba 'dod pa dag tu gyur to// de dag gis gal te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de dag ris 'thun pa de nyid kyis myur du byang chub kyi sems ma brjed par/ 
189a8(mdo sde): byang chub sems dang 'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// ji sterang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la sems bskyed na/ de dag myung du skye ba dang / 'jig pa dang / rje su 'thun pa'i babod pa thob par
189b1(mdo sde): gyur to// ji ste sems can de dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed par byed na/ sems can de dag ris 'thun pa nyid kyis/ bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thog par byed do// sems
189b2(mdo sde): can de dag thams cad kyang ngan song gsum dang bral ba dang / mtho ris su 'gro ba dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des sems can dag yongs su smin pa
189b3(mdo sde): byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrubs so// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar don che ba yin no// rigs kyi
189b4(mdo sde): bungs sems can nad pa gang dag mthong ba de dag la rig pa yo/ dang pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis sman sing ha k+Shi da ra la brangs nas nad pa la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu
189b5(mdo sde): zhi bar gyur to// gang na sman sing ha k+Shi ra med par yang / ngas de'i mdun du bzang ba dang / btung ba gang yin pa la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pas brangs nas nad
189b6(mdo sde): pa la byin na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// gal te de yang med par gyur na/ ngas sman bkus te bor ba la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi dag gis brabs nas nad pa
189b7(mdo sde): la byin na/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas shing / bla na med pa yang
189b8(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yang dag par bsgrub so// gang na shing ljon pa dag/ me tog dang 'bras bu mi skye ba der yang ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi chen po dag gis/ 
190a1(mdo sde): char ba'i tshul brabs nas/ shing dag la btab na/ shing de dag lo mang por chu med kyang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dag dang ldan par gyur to// de bzhin du bu ram shing / 
190a2(mdo sde): dang / dgun 'bru dag dang / 'bru dang / sman dag gi bar dag la yang byas so// gang na char mi 'bab cing chu med pa der yang ngas rus sbal gyi snying la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba gsang sngags kyi gzhi
190a3(mdo sde): 'dis brabs nas/ shing tsam pa ka'i 'dab mas bkris te/ klu mtsho'i 'gram du bzhag na/ char chen po dang / chu chen po'i tshogs byung bar gyur to// der chu chen po byung bas sems
190a4(mdo sde): can rnams kyi khyim dang / zhing dang / kun dga' ra ba'i bar nga chud za bar gyur na/ der yang ngas sbrul gyi rgyal po'i nor bu la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'dis
190a5(mdo sde): brabs nas/ klu'i gnas su bzhag na char chu rab tu zhi ba/ ra gyur to// gang na dus ma yin par rlung dang / nyi ma dang / dus ma yin par sprin dang / mun pa dang / rdul gyi
190a6(mdo sde): char pa dang / grang ba dang / dro ba dang / dus phyin ci log tu 'byung ba'i bar dang / dmag tshogs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa
190a7(mdo sde): dang / dus tshigs dang / lo rnams yang dag par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i bar la ngas/ snying rjes sems can rnams kyi ched du zhag bdun pa gcig gi nyin mtshan du khrus byas nas/ 'o ma
190a8(mdo sde): dang 'bras chan gyi kha zas za zhing / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa 'di las gzhan mi byed par brjod de/ nyin bdun
190b1(mdo sde): ba la gal te yul yongs su ma bskyangs na/ der nga'i mdun du rang gi dam bcas pas mi gnas pa yin no// der yang ngas rtse ldum pa sbrul gyi snying dang bcas pa la/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs ni/ 
190b2(mdo sde): ba lung bstan pa chen po 'dis brabs shing / sdug sman ma nga na'i 'bras bu dag dang bsres te/ lha rten sar bzhag pas der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sprin dang / mun pa dang / 
190b3(mdo sde): rdul gyi char pa dag dang / dro ba thams cad zhi bar gyur to// yang dag pa'i dus tshigs dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / gza' ba dang / rgyu skar dang / zla ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang
190b4(mdo sde): lo dag yang dag par byung bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu des na gang na sems can dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / so sor ldan pa dag dang / lta ba phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i
190b5(mdo sde): bar gyi sems can de dag la ngas rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di'i chos bstan to// gang du nga gang du sems can rnams kyis thos pa de dag der nyon
190b6(mdo sde): mongs chung ngu dag tu gyur to// dge mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / lta ba ngan pa thams cad spangs te/ de phyin chad dge ba'i las dang yang dag par ldan pa/ legs par byas pa'i
190b7(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' dang / smon lam ngag mang ba nges pa'i phung po dag tu gyur to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ngas thabs la 'jug pa'i sbyor ba la brtul ba des/ sems can rnams yongs su
190b8(mdo sde): smin par byas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi bar yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rig pa
191a1(mdo sde): yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni de ltar sems can rnams la gces spras byed pa yin no// de ltar phan yon mang ba yin te/ sems can thams/ 
191a2(mdo sde): cad la phan par byed pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bud med sbrum pa thams cad srung bar byed pa/ rab tu thar par byed pa/ nyon mongs thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang
191a3(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams thams cad yongs su shes par byed pa/ chos thams cad rnam par 'byed par thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par byed pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad
191a4(mdo sde): yongs su rtogs par byed pa/ sems can thams cad ra rab tu dad par byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi bde bar byed pa nga la 'jug par byed pa/ bdud dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams
191a5(mdo sde): cad chos dang 'thun pas tshar gcod par byed pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad nges par 'dul bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen
191a6(mdo sde): po 'di ni bdud rnams tshar gcod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams pham par byed pa yin te/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa/ gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar byed pa/ lha
191a7(mdo sde): ma yin rnams rnam par 'jom par byed pa/ na mkha' lding rnams dngang bar byed pa/ mi 'am ci rnams dad par byed pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par byed pa/ 'thab pa
191a8(mdo sde): dang zab mo dang / ru ge dang / 'chi ba dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char 'ang ngo / nang thams cad rnam par zhi bar byed pa/ grang ba dang
191b1(mdo sde): dro ba dang / kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / tsud pa dang / drung hrung po dang / reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ chos thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi snyan pa
191b2(mdo sde): rton par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi chad par byed pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par byed pa/ zad pa shes pa skyed par byed pa/ mi skye ba shes pa ra
191b3(mdo sde): gi mngon sum du byed pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar byed pa yin no// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen
191b4(mdo sde): bon 'di yin te/ tad ya thA/ ma nA k+Sha/ a bAk+Sha/ g+na sAk+Sh+ma/ dza ne k+ka/ marman kra/ k+ka ba kA/ man d+hAk+ka/ na Tak+ka/ na dar hu/ bis NaT/ kha ga nA Da/ aT nAT/ kun Ta/ pa ri kun Ta na Ta nA Ta
191b5(mdo sde): pa ri ka nA Ta/ ung Ta ra nA Ta/ bi nA Ta/ kun dza nA Ta/ tsa bAm b+ha ra/ nA Ta/ kha gA ma b+ha ba da Ta/ kha pud shwa ra nA Ta/ sing ha ru tran Ta/ sa mA la nA Ta/ shi ri ku sa k+ShotA Ta/ ta la mA ru Ta/ kha te
191b6(mdo sde): hu kra/ ba ti ra kA dA ma ra dzu/ bA ha na pu ti/ sa nA ti ra Na dza ba/ a mo ho ra ga dza la/ a tri nA/ a tra nA/ ra ba a tai NA kA/ a ba hi/ marga tr-i nA kA/ e Sha/ e bAn to du kha s+ya swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das
191b7(mdo sde): kyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa na 'khor der srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu ni/ rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// dkrigs pa phrag drug cu dag kyang skyon med pa la zhugs par gyur/ 
191b8(mdo sde): to// rigs kyi bu rigs pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la ngas khyod kyi lag nas bskur ro// der yang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis
192a1(mdo sde): gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u/ sems can rnams kyi las zad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags la/ nga dad pa sbyin par
192a2(mdo sde): mdzad do// rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba 'di longs la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed der song shing / nga'i bkas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod
192a3(mdo sde): pa yang ngam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhus shig/ 'di skad du byang phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu bye ma snyed 'das
192a4(mdo sde): pa de na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa/ sgra thams cad yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya// yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs
192a5(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa pal me tog gi snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin
192a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/ bcom ldan 'das la yongs su zhu ba'i slad du/ bdag mngags pa lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' lags/ 
192a7(mdo sde): sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba dag ma mchis lags sam/ gnod pa dag chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam
192a8(mdo sde): ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyis gnas dag gis gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi
192b1(mdo sde): yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis pas/ 'khor lo rab tu bskor lags sam/ gang su dag sangs rgya/ 
192b2(mdo sde): kyi zhing 'khor lo skor bar mdzad pa de dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des 'dir nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od
192b3(mdo sde): gzer gyi le'u seMs can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzugs sngags la dad pa stsol bar mdzad cing / de nas rig pa chen po yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po mthu che ba/ phan yon che/ 
192b4(mdo sde): ba 'di bskur lags te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa raru bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba nas/ 
192b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bya ba'i bar rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di lag sa so zhes kyang gsol cig/ de na thams cad dang ldan pa'i
192b6(mdo sde): 'khor de ngo mtshar thob cing / rmad du byung ba thob nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos thams cad la ma thogs pa'i ye shes dang / gzigs
192b7(mdo sde): pa ni ngo mtshar to// mchog tu ngo mtshar to// de lta lags pas/ da ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sngon ma thos pa 'di ltar zab pa/ rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung
192b8(mdo sde): bstan pa chen po sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa 'di kho na bstan to// gang la yonan 'di lta bu grangs med dpag tu med pa dag mchis de la mkhas pa byang chub tshol bar byed pa
193a1(mdo sde): su zhig mngon par brtson par mi bgyid// de na byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can gang su dag 'khor bas skrag
193a2(mdo sde): cing / byang grol gyi bde ba mngon par 'tshal ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan yongs su bsgrags pa dang / rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags kyi ming yongs su bsgrags pa ni
193a3(mdo sde): dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / gus pas sems can rnams kyi rnyed pa chen po dang / dge ba'i phyogs rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dpal
193a4(mdo sde): me tog gi snying pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu nga byang chub sems dpar gyur te
193a5(mdo sde): brtson pa 'dis spyad pa spyod pa na/ smon lam 'di lta bu bta/ ba bo// bdag byang chub thob nas sems can gang su/ ngag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na
193a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba nas/ shes rab la brtson pa'i bsam pa can zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis bdag gi ming sgrogs par byed cing / sems can thams cad
193a7(mdo sde): kyis sems par byed na/ de gal te de dag la lha dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ sems can la la pha rol tu phyin pa de dang de dag gi bar chad byed par nus pa zhig yo// 
193a8(mdo sde): na/ sems can de dag gi dge ba'i phyogs 'phel ba brgya stong du mar gyur cig/ sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyun ni ma gtogs so// bdag kyang re shig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
193b1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs pa'i 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ gang yang bud med bu la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba nas/ bu'i khur gyis skyo ba zhes bya ba'i bar dang / gang bud
193b2(mdo sde): med sbrum pa zhes bya ba'i bar bdag la phyag 'tshal bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyis dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / dad pas bdag gi ming yongs su sgrogs par byed la/ gal te ma'o// 
193b3(mdo sde): mngal na yod pa de la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa sdang ba'i sems kyis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed dam/ sman dang / gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas kyang rung ste/ lus kun tu 'khrug par byed dam/ 
193b4(mdo sde): sems kun tu 'khrug par byed dam zhes bya ba nas/ bcas pa/ tsam gyi bar la yang tha na yud tsam cig tsam yang rnam pa dar tho 'tsham par byed na/ bdag re shig bla na med pa
193b5(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tsha nga rgya bar ma gyur cig ces sngon nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i smon lam de lta bu btab bo// de bzhin du
193b6(mdo sde): da ltar yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na/ sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir ba dag kyang zhes bya ba nas/ ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin/ sems can thams cad
193b7(mdo sde): kyis dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / dad pas bdag gi ming yongasu sgrogs par byed pa thams cad sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// sbyangs pa ma
193b8(mdo sde): yin na/ sngon gyi las kyi 'bras bu'i rgyu ni ma gtogs so// / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// bam po lnga pa
194a1(mdo sde): des 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni ngo mtshar lags te/ de na sems can rnams mchog tu snang ba gzu
194a2(mdo sde): lums can/ rtsub pa/ phrag dog dang ldan pa snying brtse ba ma mchis pa/ bgyis pa mi gzo ba/ tshig rtsub por smra ba/ log par lta ba dag lags pas/ der kha cig gis bdag
194a3(mdo sde): la rnam par tho btsams pa mi rung ste/ bdag mchis pas ci yang mi sman lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// 
194a4(mdo sde): sus dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa legs pa/ der bsgoms shing / legs par yid la byas pas gyur pa de la ni/ bdud bye bar kyang rnam par tho btsam pa'o// 
194a5(mdo sde): bar chad byed par nus pa 'di ni gnas med do// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis yun ring po nas dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs ba'i gnas pa shin tu bsgoms shing legs par yid la byas
194a6(mdo sde): zin gyis mi 'jigs shig rigs kyi bu khyod la gsang sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gis bzod pa dang / dran pa dang / 
194a7(mdo sde): rab tu dang ba thob par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byams pa chen po sbyin par mdzad do// tang ya thA/ bo bri ha/ bu bu la/ e la bar
194a8(mdo sde): i la sA hA/ ha mya ga nra/ ga ga nA kA/ sha ma sha ma/ ming tra/ mingad tra/ tsakra brti ti le/ sa g+ha ra/ ti le/ durbA li/ ho hi le/ ha ba he/ na ra dza Te ya ba na mrid te/ krAn ti/ ming te/ mrid tra rA me/ mrid tra kha g+ha/ sarba
194b1(mdo sde): sa to dza mri te/ sarba kra ma mri te/ na ma brta ming tre/ d+hI tI shwar ming tre swAhA/ rigs kyi bu sdang bzhi par byed pa dang / rmongs par byed pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzungs sngags 'dis tsam pa ka'i 'bru mar la/ 
194b2(mdo sde): lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas/ lag pa gnyis bsdus na/ sdang ba thams cad dang par byed/ rmongs par byed cing / sdang ba'i sbrul dag dang / sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang
194b3(mdo sde): srul po dang / bdud bye ba brgya stong yang rung ste/ sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can de dag gis ci yang byed par mi nus so// gal te sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad kyis
194b4(mdo sde): gling bzhi pa gang bar gyur kyang / skor chu gcig gis thams cad de'i mod kho na la med par 'gyur// gal te chu srog ma can gyis rgya mtsho bzhi yongs su gang bar gyur
194b5(mdo sde): kyang rung / skyer chu gcig kho nas rab tu dang bar byed do// 'di la the tsom med kyis long la 'jig/ rten gyi khams mi mjed du song shig/ yang de'i tshe byang
194b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med pas tshig 'thun par 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
194b7(mdo sde): thub pa lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / 'dus pa chen po blta ba dang / nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzed
194b8(mdo sde): gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzugs sngags de yang mnyan par 'tshal lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te der bdag cag kyang mchir gnang ba lta na
195a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du bdag cag mchi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po nges 'di skad ces bka' stsal/ 
195a2(mdo sde): to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed thams cad so so nas/ gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang / yo byad dang / spyod lam gyi lhan cig 'thun par deng shig
195a3(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag thams cad gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad dang / rtags dang / dbyibs dang // yo byad dang / spyod lam mngon par sprul
195a4(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po la sogs pa tha mas cad de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po da'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum
195a5(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/ na mkha' la 'khod do// byang chub/ sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re res kyang // rin po che las byas pa'i pad+ma 'dab ma stong pa bdun dang / dpung gi
195a6(mdo sde): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa yang mngon par sprul to// spyod lam do lta bus de nas chas te/ de dag thams cad skad cig tu ga sog gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'dir 'khod de/ bcom
195a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed thams cad du kha cig gis ni gser
195a8(mdo sde): gyi bye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bi// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ kha cig gis ni
195b1(mdo sde): dngul gyi bye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni spos kyi phye ma'i char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni mu tig gi char mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni gas
195b2(mdo sde): skud dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis ni mu tig gi do shal dag mngon par rab tu ngab bo// kha cig gis ni dpung rgyan gyi rgyan dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// kha cig gis
195b3(mdo sde): ni ras dang / ras btsos bu dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di lan gsum
195b4(mdo sde): bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// theg pa chen po 'dus pa chen po'i mdo/  nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u las/ pho nya'i le'u ste gnyis
195b5(mdo sde): pa rdzogs so// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos sngon ma mthong ngo // tshangs pa chen po dang / brgya byin dang / sred med kyi bu
195b6(mdo sde): dang / gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba grangs med dpag tu med pa mthong nas/ mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur to// stan las langs nas/ ha cang yang thag mi ring bar 'dug go/ 
195b7(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi pho nya bzhi po de dag 'khor dang bcas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab
195b8(mdo sde): tu btud nas 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de log su me tog tsam
196a1(mdo sde): pa ka'i 'phreng ba dag gtor te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang gsol to// rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i snang ba 'dzin// lta ba nyams pa'i 'gro/ 
196a2(mdo sde): ba'i lam sprul pa// mnyam nyid ldan pa 'grol phan mdzad khyod// bdud dang klu rnams myur du 'dul mdzad khyod// 'dul dka' 'gro ba nyon mongs thar mdzad khyod// chos 'dir snang ba
196a3(mdo sde): yun ring 'bar mdzad khyod// bsam gtan sgo 'di dag gis skyes mchog ldan// zhing mang thams cad shin tu mdzes par mdzad// rgyal ba skyes mchog skye bo mkhas dgu la// rgyang
196a4(mdo sde): ring nas ni zhing 'di brjod par mdzad// 'gro ba'i chos kyi/ dus 'di bka' ba ste// de mthong bdag 'dir chos ched tshegs su mchis// 'gro ba mir skye ba ni rnyed par dka'// 
196a5(mdo sde): shin tu ring nas mir skye rnyed nas kyang // nyon mongs chen po sa zin gyur thub khyod ni// rab myur nyon mongs dra ba gcod mdzad lags// sdug bsngal mtsho dang nyon mongs
196a6(mdo sde): klung lhung ba// khyod kyis glang chen lta bur 'gro ba bsgral// rgyal bas phan tshun bdag cag pho nyar mngags// khyod kyi chos kyi gter la yi rang mdzad// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das shar
196a7(mdo sde): phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung dpag tu ma mchis pa'i bye ma snyed 'das pa de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma dros pa zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs rgyas
196a8(mdo sde): kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tsam pa ka'i mdog ces bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin ga
196b1(mdo sde): pa des bdag 'dir mngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las
196b2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad
196b3(mdo sde): lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci snyun mi mnga' logs sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ chos nyan par
196b4(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhi na du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lag das sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lag/ 
196b5(mdo sde): sam khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bdud kyi yul/ dang klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'din
196b6(mdo sde): thogs pa ma mchis par 'khor lo skor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don tu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog de khyed
196b7(mdo sde): dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas bkru'i yul 'jig pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u gzungs sngags 'di la ngang par sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs
196b8(mdo sde): sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod
197a1(mdo sde): chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zad par bgyid pa 'di yang skur lags so zhes bya ba ji ltar
197a2(mdo sde): sngar bshad pa bzhin te/ bden pa dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa 'di ni/ bdud rnams char gcod pa/ klu rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnam
197a3(mdo sde): tshim par bgyid pa/ lha ma yin rnam par 'jom par bgyid pa/ rje'u rigs rnams dga' bar bgyid pa/ dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar bgyid pa/ bud med rnams 'dod
197a4(mdo sde): chags dang bral bar bgyid pa/ mang du thos pa rnams skyob dar bgyid pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa
197a5(mdo sde): 'thab pa/ thab mo dang / mu ge dang / dus ma lags pa'i na dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rlung dang / char pa dang / chu bo dang / grang ba dang / dro ba thams cad rnam par zhi bar
197a6(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / ro mi bro ba dang / rtsub pa dang / hud hrud po dang / reg par dka' ba'i dngos po rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi
197a7(mdo sde): tshul rgyun mi 'chang bar bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par bgyid pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/ zad pa shes pa skye bar bgyid pa/ mi
197a8(mdo sde): skye ba'i shes pa rtogs par bgyid pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po rab tu 'joms par bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/ sred pa'i klung skems par bgyid pa 'di
197b1(mdo sde): yang bskur lags to// tang ya thA/ bA ye ba ya pa ri da re/ bA he/ bA hA/ pa ri bA re/ pri tI bI/ pri ti ba pa ri bA re/ A ge A ba pA ri bA re/ te dze te dza pa ri bA re/ ma le ma la pa ri bA re kha g+he kha g+ha pa ri bA re/ 
197b2(mdo sde): a lo ka/ a lo ka pa ri dA re/ sna me sna ma ba ri bA re/ ra dze ra dza pa ri bA re/ si le si la ba ri bA re/ ga me ga ma pa ri bA re/ a bo tsa/ a bo tsa pa ri bA re/ ma la ma la la me la ma ra lA rA la/ la ra
197b3(mdo sde): ma bid d+hu dz+nyA na ma b+hu tang ga me b+hu'u tung / g+ha ma pa ri bA re/ tsa kru gra he/ tsak+Shu gra ha ba ri bA re/ shrod tra gra he/ shod tra gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ g+hA Na gra he/ g+hA Na gra ha/ ba ri bA re/ dza hwA gra he/ dza hA gra ha/ pa ri bA
197b4(mdo sde): re kA ya gr-i hwe/ kA ya gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ ma na gra he/ man gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ swaR+sha gra he/ swar+ya gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ be da nA grah+Na/ be da na gra ha ba ri bA re/ tri sh+ma gra he/ tri sh+ma gra ha/ ba ri bA re/ 
197b5(mdo sde): u ba da nA gra he/ u ba da nA gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ bA ba gra he/ bA ba gra ha pa ri bA re/ dza ti gra he/ dza ti gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ dza rA/ ma ra Na gra he/ dza rA ma ra Na gra ha/ pi ra bA re/ du kha san tra
197b6(mdo sde): pa gra he/ du kha san tA pa gra ha/ pa ri bA re/ A rA pa ra d+ha dze/ A rA pa ra d+ha dza/ gra ha pa ri bA re/ A rA pA ra di dzi gra he/ A rA pA ra dI dza gra ho/ pa ri bA re/ a bArta bi brta/ s+ya a pa ra mu ba ma sA s+ya/ be g+ha
197b7(mdo sde): bi ni brta Ar+ya ra sh+mi/ sam be sha shAn ti swA hA/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog nges bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa bskur ba ni 'di lags so// 
197b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan la snyoms pa
198a1(mdo sde): zhugs pa dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
198a2(mdo sde): kyi bu 'di rang stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa tshigs 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad med pa'i bden pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa rgya cher
198a3(mdo sde): ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdogs gis gang khyod 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir/ byin pa lus kyi khyad par thams cad sgrub pa zhes bya ba nA/ 
198a4(mdo sde): shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa zhes bya ba da'i bar nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i sbu bu'i gzungs sngags de khyo da kyis kyang ston cing / de nas byang chub sems dpa'
198a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i shugs kyi snying pos 'di ska da ces gsol to// skad ya the dan/ sid d+ha ma tebi lo ka ma te/ i le ke tA ri she/ ru tse/ su ru tse/ bud d+he
198a6(mdo sde): bi bud d+he/ ma hA bud d+he/ un mad te/ un mad ta/ pra ti she d+ha ne/ rA ga dU pa/ rA ga dU pa pra ti she d+ha ne/ bin du/ bin du ma te/ tsi ta tsi ta pra ti/ she d+ha ne/ a rke tsana? drAr+d+ha/ ha ha tsi ti/ na Ta
198a7(mdo sde): nirmi/ ha ta/ kA ma/ be ga/ ha ta/ don r+N+Na ba ra dze/ ha ta tsak+ka sa ma te/ ha ta bi ma re mud tre/ ha ta yA g+he/ ha ta yA g+he/ ha ta ya g+he/ ha ta sa mu tra dza be/ ha ta bi ma na ra dze/ ha ta hi ha/ ha ta dzi tsa Te/ ha ta da swa
198a8(mdo sde): ra dze/ ha ta ba hur dze/ ha ta brdza ma ti/ ha ta u pa ga ma te/ ha ta ro ga ra sh+mi/ ha ta raM ga rash+mi/ ha ta de rma si ni/ ha ta sarbo na mA te/ dzA dzA dzA khi dza dz+nyA dzA/ sarba mA ga dze dzA/ e 'on ta ta/ sang sa ra/ 
198b1(mdo sde): du khe swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tsam pa ka'i mdog des/ bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags gsal ba ni
198b2(mdo sde): 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa snyan pa la bka' stsal pa/ snyan pa khyod kyis nyi ma'i snying po'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung shig/ 
198b3(mdo sde): snyan pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di che/ 
198b4(mdo sde): rnyed par dka'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang ru nga / gang gis kyang ri'i rgyal po ri rab bam/ rgya mtsho
198b5(mdo sde): chen po'i yon+dan dang / phan yon brjod par nus so// nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di'i yon+dan dang / ni bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par yang
198b6(mdo sde): rung ste/ brjod par mi nus so// nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// rigs kyi bu khyed kyis nyi ma'i spyan pad+ma'i gzungs sngags 'di zung shig/ kun chub
198b7(mdo sde): par gyis shig/ 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / der sems can rnams 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad spong bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ 
198b8(mdo sde): zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// shing gi
199a1(mdo sde): rgyal po'i drung du bdud ni gcig pu khyod kyis bcom// byang chub rab mchog dam pa yang ni gcig pus brnyes pa lags// lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin gcig/ 
199a2(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis dbang du mdzad// rgyal po nyi ma rab grol ye shes mchog gi 'od gzer lags// 'di na mu stegs gzhan ni gcig pu 'od dang bral mdzad pa// 'jig rten kun ni srin bu/ 
199a3(mdo sde): me khyer dag la nyi ltar mdzes// thub pa 'dus na sems can bsgral ba'i don kyang mdzad lags te// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung dang chos tshul yun ring gnas par mdzad// khyod cig
199a4(mdo sde): pu la mchod phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams lhags pa// / dge dang byang chub yongs su btsal phyir chos don gnyer ba lags// rgyal ba khyod ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod
199a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos ston pa// khyod ni ye shes byang chub spyod par/ kha mchog ston par mdzad// gcig pus zhi gyur bdud// rtsis sems can rnams kyang zhi mdzad pa// yang srid ma
199a6(mdo sde): mchis mdzad slad srog chags khrag khrig sgrol ba khyod// zag pa zad cing lta dang bral ba nyon mongs spangs gyur pa// gang na mya ngan byed med zhi ba'i grong khyer gshegs pa khyod// 'di ni
199a7(mdo sde): 'jig rten kun tu khyod gcig sman dang mtshungs lags te// rgyal ba rnams kyis khyod la zhu ba'i slad du pho nyar mngags// rig pa'i rgya mtsho thugs rje mnyam pas gnas par mdzad pa po// 
199a8(mdo sde): thub pa zla ba chos dang gsan nas gzungs kyang bskur ba lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas dper bgyi na/ grong khyer rgyar dpag tshad tsam mchi
199b1(mdo sde): pa byems bltam pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngag 'das nas/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyigs ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de na de bzhin ga
199b2(mdo sde): pari dbang rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i
199b3(mdo sde): snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad
199b4(mdo sde): cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stob das dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyan mi
199b5(mdo sde): mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag/ 
199b6(mdo sde): lags sam/ ji ltar chos thos pa bzhin du chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di
199b7(mdo sde): na/ bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'khor lo skor lags sam/ 
199b8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di na/ gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa
200a1(mdo sde): klu'i yul rnam par 'jig pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di la dang ba sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas stong
200a2(mdo sde): pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dang
200a3(mdo sde): gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad zar bgying pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ ji ltar
200a4(mdo sde): sngar bshad pa'i bar dang / sdug bsngal gyi khur 'do dar bar bgyid pa'i bar 'di yang skur lags te/ tang ya thA/ d+hu ma te/ d+hA ma te/ a kI d+hu ma te/ pra b+ha sa/ d+ha ma
200a5(mdo sde): te/ sar+b+ba kA sha/ d+hu ma te/ a bai kha g+haM/ bai me ta kha g+ha/ a khaM kri kha g+ha/ a mo ha kha g+ha/ e naM n+ya bya kha g+ha/ brA brid/ ti kha g+ha/ sa ma ru tsim kha g+ha/ a naM ma kha g+ha/ lo tsa na kha g+ha/ 
200a6(mdo sde): shi khi kha g+ha/ bi ti mi ra kha g+ha/ u kro ma kha g+ha/ u ra kha g+ha/ a krI kha g+ha/ ya bad ma no kha g+ha/ ru pa kha g+ha/ ya bang bi dz+nyA na kha g+ha/ tsak+ku d+ha du kha g+ha/ ya bang ma no bi dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha g+ha/ 
200a7(mdo sde): pri thi bi d+ha tu kha g+ha/ ya bang bidi dz+nyA na d+hA tu kha g+ha/ tsa tu smi tA pa s+thA na kha g+ha/ ya bad a be na ki kha g+ha/ du kha kha g+ha/ yA bad marge kha g+ha/ bi ba ba/ nai bak+ka ba/ a na na/ sa mud tra na na/ sarba kA
200a8(mdo sde): ra Na na/ sarba sa s+than bi shu pa na na/ a kin tsan na na/ kle b+ha \u0f88\u0f90/ i le i i le/ i i le/ mi le swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal pos khyod la stong pa
200b1(mdo sde): nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskur ba ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs so// zhes bya ba gnang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du thams
200b2(mdo sde): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lhags pas kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa dag ni ma gtogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
200b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'dir nga stan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don dang bcas pa/ tshig 'bru dang bcas
200b4(mdo sde): pa lhag cad med pa'i stong pa nyid dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi dbu de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal pos/ gang khyod
200b5(mdo sde): 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe bsrung ba'i phyir byin pa mi zad pa'i sgrub sa kyi lung bstan pa/ sems can rnams kyi sem sa dang tshor ba bsgrub pa yang dag par 'dul ba thams cad
200b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa dang / bdud bzhi 'dul ba sgrub pa'i gnas dang / chos kyi tshul dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung sgrub pa mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i bar de
200b7(mdo sde): khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po ches 'di skad ces gsol te// tad ya thA/ sha Na bya ya/ shik+ka bya ya/ smi ti bya ya/ 
200b8(mdo sde): pra ha na bya ya/ ring di bya ya/ in dri ya bya ya bya ya/ bo d+h+yang ga bya ya/ sa mA d+hi bya ya/ d+ha ra Ni bya ya/ krAn ti bya ya/ d+hu na ni bya ya/ a rU pa bya ya/ A na ni dza bya ya/ mArga bya ya/ a be dz+nyA bya ya/ 
201a1(mdo sde): pra ti sa ma bri ta bya ya/ d+hu mi bya ya/ bing dra bya ya/ mahAme tri bya ya/ ma hAka run bya ya/ brid ti b+hi bya ya/ sad ta bya ya/ d+harma bya ya/ tam b+ha ya/ A lo ka bya ya/ pra tiH
201a2(mdo sde): sa bya ya pra ti shu rung kA bya ya/ ga gan bya ya/ mA ra byi ya/ shUn+ya ta bya ya/ pra ti t+ya bya ya/ a pre Ni hing bya sa/ A ni ming ta bya ya/ ru ta bya ya/ g+ho sha bya ya/ a kin tsan bya ya/ a bi sa pa
201a3(mdo sde): an nu/ a no na/ a ba ha/ tsa tsA ra/ tsa tsa tsA ra bi mA/ tsa tsi tsek+Sha/ tsaM tsA ra bi mu/ bya ya/ bi mu/ krA ya ba~M mu/ a pa bye ya ba~M mu/ a sa mu da tsa ra bi mu/ ts+tshe bi mu/ A kA sha bi mu/ byung sham
201a4(mdo sde): bi mu/ an b+ha sa bi mu/ a ha ha bi mu/ a pa sha ma des li la bi mu swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ri dbang rgyal po des bdag chas pa'i dus/ 
201a5(mdo sde): kyi tshe/ bdag bsrung ba'i slad du mi zad pa'i sbubs kyis gzungs sngags stsal pa ni 'di lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
201a6(mdo sde): ko'u di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ ke'u di n+ya khyod kyis mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'di zung shig/ ko'u de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed
201a7(mdo sde): par dka'o// de bas kyang mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos kyis kyang rung
201a8(mdo sde): bskal pa brgya stong gis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi skad cig bgrang bar nus so// gang dag mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi gzungs sngags 'dir mun pa med par 'dug pas zhugs pI/ 
201b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag ni gang gis kyang bgrang ba mi nus so// ko'u di na de lta bas na mi zad pa'i sbubs kyi lung bstan pa'i chos 'di ji ltar thos pa 'khor
201b2(mdo sde): bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de dag chos de thos pas las thams cad zad pa thob par 'gyur ba nas/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag dang / 
201b3(mdo sde): spobs pa gcad du med pa dag dang / spobs pa rgyun mi chad pa'i bar dag thob par 'gyur zhing / khams gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dag tu'ang
201b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu
201b5(mdo sde): btud nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gas la to// 'gro drug sdug bsngal gyis khrid cing // nyon mongs nad kyis kun tu g.yengs// khyod ni mkhas pa
201b6(mdo sde): mgon gyur khyod// rgal nas 'gro ba sgrol mdzad khyod// dbang po drug la rmongs gyur cing // bdud kyi zhabs pas nyer zin la// yang dag lam ni ston pa khyod// 'jig rten na
201b7(mdo sde): ni rab rnyed dka'// yan lag drug ldan khyim gyi gzhi// mkhas pa'i mi yis spangs pa lags// khyod ni 'jig rten kun gyi gnyen// chos kyi mu ga 'jig mdzad pa// mngon
201b8(mdo sde): shes drug ldan sgom chen lags// bden pa gsung ba drang srong che// sems can 'khor bar zhugs pa rnams// 'ching ba dam las sgrol mdzad khyod// khyod kyi sngags la dad na su// 
202a1(mdo sde): zhing 'dir yang ni lhags pa lags// 'dir ni 'jig rten mgon po yis// bdag cag po nyar mngags kyis gson// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nub byog
202a2(mdo sde): na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das nas/ de na 'jig rten gyi khams snying po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bgyi ba mchis so// sangs
202a3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing de na de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tshe zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag sangs
202a4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshe/ dgas pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u/ 
202a5(mdo sde): sems can rnams kyi las 'byang ba'i gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung nga ma/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gar+tha
202a6(mdo sde): sam zhes kyang 'dri bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa rlung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba ma mchis sam/ gnod pa
202a7(mdo sde): chub lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du yang chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid pa dag lags sam/ chos kyi gnas
202a8(mdo sde): bas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig lags sam/ 'din thogs
202b1(mdo sde): pa ma mchis par 'khor lo skor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po
202b2(mdo sde): de khyod dang nyi ma'i rgyal po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po'i chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i gzungs sngags 'di
202b3(mdo sde): la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags thams cad yang dag par zad par/ 
202b4(mdo sde): bgyid pa gzugs kyi 'dod chags thams cad dadang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags thams cad ya dang dag par zad par bgyid pa/ nga rgyal dang / lhag pa'i nga rgyal/ 
202b5(mdo sde): dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal thams cad yang dag par zad par bgyid pa 'di yang bskur lags te zhes bgyi ba nas/ ma rig pa'i mun pa'i phung po thams cad rab tu 'joms
202b6(mdo sde): par bgyid pa/ sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin no// tang ya thA/ sha na sha na/ sha man sha ba/ a bkra ba sha/ tsak+Shu b+ha ba sha ga shwa
202b7(mdo sde): tra sha ga g+hA Na sha ga dzeH she ba kA ya sha ga/ mA na sha ba/ krA ta bing dra tsak+Shu/ br-i to bi krAb+ta/ kro tra A bAk+sha b+ha/ dzi hAbAk+sha b+ha man/ o dza kA b+ha/ a lo ka dz+nyA na kra b+ha/ bi dza sad kra mak+ka b+ha/ ang
202b8(mdo sde): ra kha b+ha/ krA b+ha sha ma/ ka ru kA b+hakrA ya/ ra swa kra b+ha/ shan ta bya srak+ka b+ha/ na ton te/ na ton/ a ba nair to// nan yA ba na yan ton/ e la an to du kha s+ye swAhA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de
203a1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po ngas/ smon pa med pa'i rjes 'thun pa'i gzungs sngags bskung ba ni 'di lags so// bcom ldan 'das
203a2(mdo sde): kyis kyang leg so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi nang du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams kyis
203a3(mdo sde): kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snang ba'i snying po dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs
203a4(mdo sde): kyi bu bstan 'di nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po lhag cha/ da med pa smon pa med pa dang rjes su 'thun pa'i gzungs
203a5(mdo sde): sngags 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brdegs rgyal pos/ gang khyod la 'dir 'ong ba'i tshe byin pa/ rigs sngags
203a6(mdo sde): kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ lung bstan pa des ni 'dir sems can rnams kyi sred pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang chen po nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rab tu zhi bar
203a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bsnyil bar 'gyur ro// las
203a8(mdo sde): 'byang ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin te/ bstan par bgyi lags so// tad ya thA/ be g+ha pa ri
203b1(mdo sde): ts+tshe de/ gar+b+ha sa krA se/ gar+b+ha re bid dra pra b+ha ga kle krA ya yo ge pra ti ha re sha man nA si ka the/ sa ma me g+ha dza She/ a krA ya na te/ kA b+ha ba dze/ ning d+ha dza She/ sa man dza She/ ad+ya sha ya dz+ha She/ bi pra ba
203b2(mdo sde): dz+ha She/ she kra dza She/ sin+ya dza ba d+ha She/ sa li la gu hra dz+ha She/ sa la gu h+ya be k+ka ba na ko she/ sa d+han ko no sde ba dA nan b+he/ bi ta brid te/ u pa kra ma pa the/ an ts+tshe d+ya pra khe/ pra ti kra me Na/ sa
203b3(mdo sde): khang thA shaM sa lo tsan pa me/ kro d+ha d+ha re/ kA mA sa she/ A kA sha kha gi na g+ha kun tse/ bing dra ba ne klan pa ne/ u tsa ba ne/ sa ma ma ka re/ shI ra ya ba ne/ mo g+ha dza be/ ha ri ko na pa na ya
203b4(mdo sde): na mu khe sA ra kra ko le nA rA yu dzu re/ in dra bA sa me/ oM a/ a ra ba a/ a ra ba a/ ba rA/ A ba rA/ sa dme g+ha du kha ni sti ra ni ni ba he swA hA// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
203b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes dpal brtsegs rgyal po des/ bdag chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du rigs sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa stsal ba ni 'di lag
203b6(mdo sde): so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shar dwa ti'i bu/ khyod kyis rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags
203b7(mdo sde): 'di zung shig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang rigs sngags
203b8(mdo sde): kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis kyang rung bskal pa brgyas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
204a1(mdo sde): gyi khams kyi sa'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab rnams bgrang ba 'am/ mtha' rtogs par nus so// rigs sngags kyi rten gyi gzungs sngags 'di'i mtha'
204a2(mdo sde): ni bskal pa brgya stong gis kyang brjod par mi nus so// rigs sngags kyi rten gyi lung bstan pa 'di ni de ltar zab pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis rigs sngags 'di yang
204a3(mdo sde): zung shig/ kun chub par byos shig/ 'khor bzhi po dag la yang rgyas par ston cig/ yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / de thos pas kyang sems can de dag gi sred pa
204a4(mdo sde): chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po srid pa'i rgyu rnams// dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med na spyod pa'i nyo// na mongs pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams rab tu zhi bar 'gyuraro// 
204a5(mdo sde): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rgyab kyis phyogs pa ra 'gyur ro// bud med mtshams med pa byed pa'i la sa kyi sgrib pa srid pa'i rgyu rnams zad par 'gyur zhing / 
204a6(mdo sde): lhag ma med pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// zag pa thams cad zad pa dang / byang grol gyi bde ba dang ldan pa'i bar du yang 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
204a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba rab tu btud nas/ de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// khyod ni ded dpon gcig
204a8(mdo sde): pu lags// chos rnams kun la nges pa ste// mthong ba'i gus pa skyes pa yin// gshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin// me tog gcig dang bdug pa yis// de bzhin
204b1(mdo sde): gshegs pa mchod bgyis na// yan lag kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i// bshes gnyen sdug pa nye bar 'dzin// tshogs ni chen po bsdus pa yang // dus gcig tu ni 'dir mdzad pas/ 
204b2(mdo sde): lha rnams thams cad sngags bgyid cing // gshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin// der ni 'jig rten mgon po yis// 'di ni lan cig kho na bstan// rtag tu lha min// 
204b3(mdo sde): shes rab ldan// bshes gnyen dpal yang nye bar 'dzin// dpal gyi me tog snying po ni// dpal rnams kun gyis kun tu brgyan// de'i sa shAkya'i dpal zhu bar// bdag/ 
204b4(mdo sde): cag pho nyar mngags pa lags// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs kyi phyogs cha na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad
204b5(mdo sde): cu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa nas/ snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa de na 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad yang da ga par 'phags pa zhes bgyi ba mchis// sangs rgya/ 
204b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal me tog gi snying po zhes bgyi ba bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 
204b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag 'dir mngags lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de khyod nyi ma'i snying po'i chos gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa'i 'od gzer
204b8(mdo sde): gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba gzungs sngags 'di 'chad pa la dad pa sbyin par mdzad cing / gnod pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas
205a1(mdo sde): sam zhes kyang zhu bar mdzad lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ khyod kyi 'khor bro 'tshal ba
205a2(mdo sde): ma mchis sam/ gnod pa chung lags sam/ dam pa'i chos nyan par 'tshal ba dag lags sam/ ji ltar chos rjes su thos pa bzhin du/ chos de la nan tan snying por bgyid lags sam
205a3(mdo sde): chos kyis gnas pas gnas par bgyid lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ bdud kyi yul dang / klu'i yul bcom lags sam/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul gcig pu
205a4(mdo sde): lags sam/ 'di na thogs pa ma mchis par chos kyi 'kho dar lo skor lags sam/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gang su dag 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don tu de bzhin
205a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po de khyod dang nyi ma'i snying po chos kyis gnas pa/ klu'i yul rnam par 'jig pa'i 'od gzer gyi le'u sems can rnams kyi las 'byung ba'i
205a6(mdo sde): gzungs sngags 'di la dad pa sbyin par mdzad lags so// de nas zhi ba rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ sems can thams cad la phan pa
205a7(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar bgyid pa/ phung po dang skye mched thams cad yongs su shes par bgyid pa/ chos thams cad rnam
205a8(mdo sde): par 'byed par bgyid pa/ thabs thams cad yang dag par ston par bgyid pa/ byang grol gyi bde ba thams cad yongs su myong bar bgyid pa/ sems can thams cad rab tu dad par bgyid/ 
205b1(mdo sde): pa/ chos thams cad kyi bde ba la 'jug par bgyid pa/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ bdud kyi yul thams cad rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa 'di
205b2(mdo sde): yang bskur lags te/ rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po 'di ni/ bdud rnams tshar gcod par bgyid pa/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams pham par bgyid pa/ lha rnams dga' bar
205b3(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ gnod sbyin rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ lha ma yin rnams rnam par 'jom par bgyid pa/ nam mkha' lding rnams yang dag par mgu bar bgyid pa/ mi 'am ci rnams
205b4(mdo sde): dad par bgyid pa/ lto 'phye chen po rnams rgyab kyis phyogs par bgyid pa/ phas kyi rgol ba rnams 'dul bar bgyid pa/ rgyal rigs rnams mngon par dag par bgyid pa/ bram ze rnams
205b5(mdo sde): 'jug par bgyid pa/ rje'u rigs rab tu 'joms par ba/ gyid pa/ dmangs rigs rnams mchog tu dga' bar ba/ gyid pa/ bud med 'dod chags dang bral bar bgyid pa
205b6(mdo sde): bud med sbrum bde legs su yongs su thar par bgyid pa/ mang du thos pa rnams dran par bgyid pa/ rnal 'byor spyod pa rnams mngon par dga' bar bgyid pa/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar
205b7(mdo sde): bgyid pa/ 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / mu ge dang / 'chings dang / nad dang / pha rol gyi dmigs tshogs dang / dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / char pa dang / chu bo dang / grang ba dang / dro ba dang / 
205b8(mdo sde): kha ba dang / tsha ba dang / rtsub pa dang / drung hrung po dang / 'dus te reg par dka' ba rnams rnam par zhi bar bgyid pa/ chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rton par bgyid
206a1(mdo sde): pa dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi bcad par bgyid pa/ 'khor bas skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par bgyid pa/ zad par shes pa skyed par bgyid pa/ mi skye ba
206a2(mdo sde): shes pa rang gi mngon sum du bgyid pa/ mun pa'i phung po rnam par 'jig par bgyid pa sdug bsngal gyi khur 'dor bar bgyid pa/ mthu che ba lags so// tad ya thA/ mA nA kra/ A nA kra/ gra sa
206a3(mdo sde): k+ka/ dza lA k+ka/ man+takra/ kraHk+ka/ man trA k+ka/ na Dar tu bi sAn Ta/ khagA nA Ta/ a rban rba/ kun Ta/ ba ri kus naT/ nA T+Ta nA Ta/ ba ri kan Ta/ uT ran Ta/ ka bo nA Ta/ kun dzi na Ta/ am
206a4(mdo sde): kha nA Ta/ tsa be ma b+ha nA Ta/ kha ga ma b+ha nA Ta/ pu kA ra danA Ta/ hi sa du tA nA Ta/ sa mA la yA na Ta/ shi ra ku ma ra ko/ bu ta Ta/ mA tu gu ra ba/ twe hu krA ba ni ra dzu/ dA na ma ra dzu
206a5(mdo sde): 'u ba g+ha na pu te/ san tI ra ba dza ba/ ma ho ra ga dzA lA/ a/ tri Na/ a tri Na/ a tra Na/ na ba/ a be/ a tri Nak+ka/ a ba ha marga tri nA kA/ e shod tro du kha b+ha ra s+ya sA hA/ 
206a6(mdo sde): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying pos rig pa mchis pa'i sbubs zhi ba lung bstan pa chen po// mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba 'di bskur lags so// de nas bcom
206a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das shAkya thub pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // bsam gtan la brtson pa rnams ma gtogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed du lpags pa'i sems can thams cad dang ldan pa rnams
206a8(mdo sde): kyis kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu ngastan 'di
206b1(mdo sde): nyid la bzhugs bzhin du sems can rnams la rig pa yod pa'i sbubs zhi ba'i gzungs sngags don dang bcas pa/ tshigs 'bru dang bcas pa/ lhag chad med pa 'di rgya cher ston par mdzad do// 
206b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des/ gang khyod chas pa'i dus kyi tshe/ gsang sngags gang dag gis sdang ba thams cad dad par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags sdang ba
206b3(mdo sde): zhi bar byed pa dang / gnyid kyis log par byed pa/ dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa byin pa de khyod kyis kyang ston cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bstan
206b4(mdo sde): par bgyi lags so// tad ya thA/ bo bri ha/ bu bur/ ta ra la ra ba/ i la sa ha/ ha n+ya ha gu/ ga ga na kA/ sha ma mi ta tra/ da tsa ka brti/ ti le/ sa ga ra ti le dU na hi le/ hi le/ ha ba ha
206b5(mdo sde): na ra dza te/ ya ba na mi te/ kri ti mi te/ b+ha ra mid tre/ shi khi ming tre/ ma ru ta ming tre/ sarbo dza mid te/ sarba kra ma mi da tre/ ma nA ma ru ming tre/ d+hA tu shwa ra ming tre swA hA/ 
206b6(mdo sde): kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying pos/ sdang ba zhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sdang ba'i sbrul thams cad rang gi gnas
206b7(mdo sde): su dong nas/ gnyid kyis logs par gyur te/ gang zag bzod pa thob pa rnams dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni ma gtogs so// 
206b8(mdo sde): srid pa na gang dag sdang ba'i gnod sbyin rnams dang / gang dag sdang ba'i lha ma yin rnams dang zhes bya ba nas/ sdang ba'i na mkha' lding rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / sdang ba'i mi 'am ci rnams
207a1(mdo sde): shes bya ba'i bar dang / yi dgas rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / sha za rnams shes bya ba'i bar dang / srul po rnams zhes bya ba'i bar dang / gang dag sdang ba'i lus
207a2(mdo sde): srul po rnams shes bya ba'i bar de dag rang gi gnas su dong nas/ gnyid kyis log par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob par rnams dang / phyir mi ldog pa rnams ni ma gtog so// 
207a3(mdo sde): gang dag sdang ba'i mi gzu lums can dang / rtsub pa dang / snying brtse ba med pa dang / phan tshun mi 'thun pa dang / rtag tu khro ba spyod pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol gyis 'jigs par mi lta
207a4(mdo sde): ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spo/ dang bar byed pa dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa da dang / mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang sdang ba zhi bar byed
207a5(mdo sde): pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i bstan pa 'di thos pasathams cad mchog tu byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa da ga dang / snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / snying brtse
207a6(mdo sde): ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / khon med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / mi 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / 'jig/ 
207a7(mdo sde): rten pha rol gyis 'jig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / dkon mchog gsum la lhag par gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / chos la dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / zhi ba'i
207a8(mdo sde): sems dang ldan pa dag tu gnas par gyur to// gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal me tog gi snying po des bdag chas pa'i tshe/ bsrung ba'i slad du gang
207b1(mdo sde): sdang ba zhi bar bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags de sprul pa ni 'di lags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu la bka' stsal pa/ mo'u dgal gyi
207b2(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis sdang ba zhi bar byed pa/ gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa'i rgyu 'thun pa 'di zung shig/ mo'u dgal gyi bu de bzhin
207b3(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba rnyed par dka'o// de bas kyang sdang ba zhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs
207b4(mdo sde): sngags dmigs pa med pa'i tshangs pa'i gnas pa rgyu 'thun rab 'di ches rnyed par dka'o// mo'u dgal gyi bu sdang ba zhi bar byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa 'di ni bskal pa
207b5(mdo sde): brgya stong du las gzhan mi byed par bstan kyang / lha dang bcu sa pa'i 'jig rten dang / tha na byang chub sems dpa'/ sems dpa' chen po sa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang rung
207b6(mdo sde): gang gis kyang don gzung bar mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ni ma gtogs te/ de ltar zab cing de ltar don che ba yin la/ de ltar phan yon che ba yin no// bla na med pa yang dag par
207b7(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam dang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin zhing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i snying rje chen po yang thob par byed pa'o// mo'u ngagal gyi bu de bas
207b8(mdo sde): na sdang bzhi par byed pa gnyid kyis log par byed pa'i gzungs sngags 'di zung shig/ dus dus su sems can rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/ sems can gang dag nyan par
208a1(mdo sde): byed pa de dag kyang thos pa tsam gyis yon+dan dang phan yon mang po thob par 'gyur ro// khro ba mang pos mi 'dod pa myong bar 'gyur ba/ las kyi rnam par
208a2(mdo sde): smin pa'i 'bras bu rnams med par 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'gyur ro// 'khor ba'i skyon mang po rnam par shes par 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po skyed par 'gyur ro// bsod nams
208a3(mdo sde): mang po so sor 'dzin par byed do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang po la ston par byed// snyen par byed do// bsnyen bskur byed do// des na de dag bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
208a4(mdo sde): mi ldog par 'gyur ro// mo'u dgal gyi bu gzungs sngags la da ni chos kyi mar me 'bar bar byed pa/ dkon mchog gas dam gyi gdung mi chad par byed pa yin no// 'dus pa chen po
