290a6(mdo sde): yis ni// lo ni de ltar 'gro bar byed// mig stong yang dang yang du ni// 'dus te chos kyi phyogs la ltos// khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na// chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis// 
290a7(mdo sde): chos gnas tshul khrims phun sum tshogs// thos phyug mkhas pa bsam gtan pa// de dag khyod kyis chos gos dang // gza' btung rnams kyis rjesu bsrungs// yang dag
290a8(mdo sde): gnas te brgya byin gyis// rnga bong la ni thal sbyar nas// rab tu smras pa bdag cag gi/ bya ba yang ni bsgo bar gyis// smras pa/ lha yi bla ma khyod kyisu// rtag par tshangs par spyod
290b1(mdo sde): bsrungs// rigs sngags sman dang gsang sngags rnams// thams cad la ni bya ba sgrubs// las kun drang srong zla ba dang // zla ba chung dang zhag dang bzhi// bzo'i las kyis mtha'
290b2(mdo sde): kun la// gtso bo yin par bkod pa yin// drag po dug gi sna can dang // dgon pa dang ni lci ba ste// gnod sbyin bzhi po de dag ni// mchod sbyin rib mar gtso bor bkod// 
290b3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chu lha 'jog po dang // rin chen skyong dang ring du 'gro/ sa yid ches dang zla srung dang // gnas thar byed pa rgya mtsho ni// gcor bar bzhag te ma dros dang // khab kyis lus
290b4(mdo sde): 'bigs chu lhas byas// ri dgas 'khrug pa'ang klung de nga bzhin// klung rnams kyi ni gtso bor bkod// khyod ni dge ba rab bskyed pa// no tse yi ni khyab byed pa// mkhas
290b5(mdo sde): pa zhing gi gtso bo ste// de 'dra ba ni ji lta bur// khyod ni sI/ nga po kho nas kyang // mi yi rtse mo'i gtso bo ste// da ni rlung dmar 'gul g.yo ba// rlung ni yang ba'i ga
290b6(mdo sde): bor yin// rdo rje'i mig dang seng ge'i mig/ legs mthong lag na gdung gsum thogs// lha mo bzhin po de dag ni// grong khyer gtso bor bkod pa yin// gong ma'i cha ga skyes
290b7(mdo sde): rtsi 'u khyud// 'khor lo spen pa gnod sbyin bzhi// de dag rin chen brtag pa la// nyo tshong byed pa'i gtso bor bkod// phyogs 'tsham su ni bzhi yin te// srungs pa'i phyir ni yang dag
290b8(mdo sde): gnas// yul 'khor grong khyer thams cad du// srung ba'i phyir ni 'byung po bkod// drang srong dag ni thams cad dang // lha yi tshogs dang klu rnams dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams
290'a1(mdo sde): ches lnga la ni sngon yin// ches drug la ni snrums yin te// chos bdun la ni chu stod yin// tshes brgyad la ni chu smad yin// chos dgur byi bzhin gro bzhin te/ 
290'a2(mdo sde): bcu la ni mon gru yin// tshes bcu gcig la mon gri ste// tshes bcu gnyis la khrums stong yin// tshes bcu gsum la khrums smod yin// tshes bcu bzhi la nam gru ste// zla rangs
290'a3(mdo sde): nyatshams tha skar yin// ston zla 'bring po'i ngo la ni// lo skor bdag gis brjod par bya// lho'i phyogasu kha ltas ste// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// nyin par bcu drug 'gro byed cing // 
290'a4(mdo sde): mtshan mo yang ni bcu bzhi yin// khrums stod kyis ni ma chen mo 'thob// nyi ma'i mdun na nag pa yin// gring tsho dang ngag ni gro bzhin ste// nyi ma yongasu 'khor bar byed// lha yi
290'a5(mdo sde): bla ma sba ba sangs// gza' ni zhing la rnam par gzhaga' dir khyim srang zhes bya ba bzhag/ zla ba bcu gnyis bshad pa yin// yongasu 'khor ba de yis ni// lo ni de
290'a6(mdo sde): ltar 'gro bar byed// mig stong yang dang yang du ni// 'dus te chos kyi phyogs la lto// khyod ni shes rab gzhi yin na// chos ma yin pa'ang bzlog par gyis// yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs/ 
290'a7(mdo sde): dang lha dang kra yi sa rnams dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos khyab// der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags// des yis gom pa bdun bor te// ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa
290'a8(mdo sde): ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur// 'gro ba rga nang sdug bsngal dang // 'chi bas gzir las ngas dgrol zhing // zhi ba bde ba mya ngan me// skam la dgod ces shAg sras gsung // me tog
290'b1(mdo sde): dri dang rin chen dag/ lha klu rnams kyis gtor gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis// sras po la ni bstod gyur pa// bskal pa mang po du mar yang // sngon chad khyod kyis/ 
290'b2(mdo sde): dul ba dang // sbyin dang bsam gtan dgyes la bstan// sems can kun ched sdug bsngal bzod // 'di las skye ba 'di dang ni// thams cad kyi ni tha ma lag/ sdug bsngal thams
290'b3(mdo sde): cad ni mdzad par// ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya// des kyang dpa' bo bstan par gyur// mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs// drug khri tham pa spang nas su// spyod pa rab bstan lo
290'b4(mdo sde): drug spyong // g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i// bdun ni gci dag pus bcom nas kyang // byang chub zhi mchog gzhal med brnyes// mya ngan med lamangon dam gzigs/ byams
290'b5(mdo sde): dang ye shes thugs rje yis// sems can kun dang mi mnya ma zhing // 'byung po dag ni thams cad la// de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa// sems can gang la'ang mtho
290'b6(mdo sde): mi 'tshams// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las// thar par mdzad cing de yang na// rnam bcings brtson ra thar mdzad pa// ma ga d+ha na de gnas shing // 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang
290'b7(mdo sde): ston// de la khyod kyis gsol pa thob// byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos// drang srong mchog gi thad du deng // 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thad las// khyed cag yongasu thar par byed// rang nyid
290'b8(mdo sde): kyang ni 'dong bar gyis// dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// phyin chad mkha' lding thams cad las// 'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo // rtag pade sdug bsngal bral dgar gyis/ 
291a1(mdo sde): kyi khar yang rje su yid rang byed// lus brtan rab tu rgyal ba mchog/ thub pa yi ni gtso bo ste// khyod ni skye dang 'gag pa dang // zas dang ro dang me tog mchog
291a2(mdo sde): khyod ni 'di la byed pa ste// shu dag rdzogs byed 'bras bu'i mchog/ khyod ni lam bde skyed pa ste// rnam par 'tshe las rgyal ba'i gtso// dga' bo dang ni nye dga' gnyis// ri bo rnam
291a3(mdo sde): kyi gtso bor bkod// nor rgyas bu dang thang shing zhing // lci mchog mig dmar dmugs byed skye ma// khyod ni dbyangs can chu yi gtso// khyod ni grub dang yid 'phrog pa// zla ba 'phrog
291a4(mdo sde): par byed pa ste// bcud kyi len gyi gtso bo yin// gza' dang rgyu skar dus kyang yin// khyim rnams thams cad rnam par bzhag/ rgyal po chen po bzhi yang ni// skal ldan
291a5(mdo sde): rgyur ni rnam par bzhag/ lus ngan gnod sbyin rnams kyi gtso// grul bum rnams kyi 'phags skyes po/ klu rnams kyi ni spyan mi bzang // dri za rnams kyi yul 'khri
291a6(mdo sde): bsrung // thams cad kyi gling chen po bzhi// gling bzhan brgyad khri thams cad du// drang srong rnga bong gis gang yongasu skyong ba bkod par btang ba'i gnas ci yang med// der lha dang / 
291a7(mdo sde): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang leg so zhes bya ba byas par
291a8(mdo sde): gyur te// drang srong rnga bong gi bya ba de la yang dag par rje su yid rang bar gyur te// bya ba de ni mchod pa dang // rim gror bya bar so sor gnas par gyur to// de'i rjesu shin tu yun ring
291b1(mdo sde): zhig na// drang srong thub pa lam zhes bya ba byung ste// des kyang skar ma'i dpyad rab tu byaso// zhag gis mi thub pa dang / shol yod par yang bshad do// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i
291b2(mdo sde): gnas rten ga la ba der klu thams cad 'dus te/ de dag drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la mchog tu bla ma la gus pa dang gces par byed pa skyes te/ de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ 
291b3(mdo sde): ci nus su brtson par gyur te// // 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po thegs pa chen po'i mdo las/ nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu bcig pa la so// rgyu skar gyi sbyor ba rnam par bzhag po
291b4(mdo sde): le'u rdzogs s+ho// // / 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i me do// bram po bcu gcig pa'o// 
291b5(mdo sde): rgya mtshos smras pa// na mkha' la ni rgyu skar tshogs// ji ltar bzhag pa bzhin du ni// khyod kyis sngon no rabs dran// mkhas khyod srid gsum kun gyi gtso// 
291b6(mdo sde): khyod kyi snying rje byams pa dper// shes gsal 'gro la snying pa rtse bzhin// kun dpal 'di nas khyod kyis ni// lag 'gro thams cad thar par gyis// srid gsum tshul brtul
291b7(mdo sde): motshungs med khyod// lag 'gro bde kun tshim byed khyod// khyod ni drang srong kun gyi bla// mi rnams kyis ni mchod par 'os// 'gro ba'i kun dpal khyod la ni// lha dang lag 'gro
291b8(mdo sde): gnod sbyin tshogs// rten gyis yul rnams thams cad pa// log 'gro myur du thar par gyis// de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu yid dang bskyed
292a1(mdo sde): par 'dod nas de lta bu'i klu'i tshogs thams cad la shin tu rigs pa'i tshig snyan pa dag gis// 'di skad ces smra so// yon+dan de 'dra bdag la med// drang
292a2(mdo sde): srong rnga bong bdag ma yin// khyed cag 'di nas thar byed par// bdag gis nus pa ma yin no// gang gis bskal pa du mar ni// dka' thub dka' ba bzod pa spang // khyed cag/ 
292a3(mdo sde): thar bar byed pa yi// drang srong gzhan de lta bar gyis// rtag tu brtson zhing sbyin pa byin// mkhas shing glang chen rta dang ni// shing rta bu dang chung ma dang // nor gyis sems
292a4(mdo sde): can phan pa byas// rka lag mgo dang rna ba dang // mig dang spags po khrag dang ni// bu bran bran mo bza da' btung mang // mal cha kha zas sngon chad btang // snying / 
292a5(mdo sde): rje dang ni byams pa yis// khyed cag thar byed srid pa/ sum na// mtshungs med bsam gtan dag 'byung pa// de ni drang srong rnga bong ste// kun tu brtse zhes byang chub
292a6(mdo sde): sems// sngon chad ri dgas pha rol phyin// sems can mang po sdug bsngal gyis// nyam thag pa ni thar par byas// sems can gcig gi ched du yang // sngon gyi tshe rabs de
292a7(mdo sde): bskal par// dmyal bar 'gro bzod des yi dgas// de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas byung // sems can sdug bsngal nyams thag kun// sdug bsngal thar mdzad rnga bong
292a8(mdo sde): yin 'a sems can smin byed byed brtson 'grus dang // snying rje brtan pos de srid 'khor// rnga bong de ni sems pa na// rgyal sras bu ram shing ba yi// rigasu zas gtsang gi ni/ 
292b1(mdo sde): sras dnges ni bcas ma thag tu khyab/ srid gsum dade 'byung 'jig rten dpal// yid bde rnam pa sna tshogs dang // lha dang klu yis rnams dang // 'byung po gnod sbyin rgyal pos
292b2(mdo sde): khyab// der ni mchod phyir thams cad lhags// des yis gom pa bdun bor te// ri dang rgya mtshor bcas pa yi// sa ni thams cad 'khrugs par gyur// 'gro ba rga nang sdug
292b3(mdo sde): bsngal dang // 'chi bas gzir las nges dgrol zhing // zhi ba bde ba mya ngan me// skam la dgod ces shAg sras gsung // me tog dri dang rin chen dag/ lha klu rnams kyis gti
292b4(mdo sde): gyur cing // 'byung ngo'i tshogs rnams sna tshogs kyis/ sras po la ni bstod gyur pa// bskal pa mang po du myur yang // sngon chad khyod kyis dul ba dang // sbyin
292b5(mdo sde): dang bsam gtan dgyes la bstan// sems can kun ched sdug bsngal 'azod// 'di las skye ba 'dri ni// thams cad kyi ni tha ma lag/ sdug bsngal thos
292b6(mdo sde): cad zhi mdzad par// ring po mi thogs khyod 'tshang rgya// des kyang dpa' bo bstan par gyur// mtshungs pa med de bud med tshogs// drug khri tham pa spang na su// spyod pa rab
292b7(mdo sde): bstan lo drug spyang // g.yo sgyu can ni sder bcas pa'i// bdud ni gcig pus bcom nas kyang // byang chubazhi mchog gzhal med brnyes// mya ngan med lamangon dam gzigs
292b8(mdo sde): byams dang ye shes thugs rnga yis// sems can kun dang mi mnyam zhing // 'byung po dag ni thams cad la// de ni byams pa'i thugs mnyam pa// sems can gang las
293a1(mdo sde): mtho mi 'tshams// sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las// thar par mdzad cing de yang na// rnam bcings brtson ra thar mdzad pa// ma ga d+hA na de
293a2(mdo sde): gnas shing // 'gro ba'i nang na chos kyang ston// de la khyod kyis gsol ba thob// byams pa'i yid kyis rnam par ltos// drang srong mchog gi thang du deng // 'gro ba'i sdug
293a3(mdo sde): bsngal thams cad lus// khyed cag yongasu thar par byed// rang nyid kyang ni 'dong bar gyis// dga' mchog bde ba 'dod rnams kyis// phyin chad mkha' lding thams ca
293a4(mdo sde): las// 'jigs pa khyed la mi 'byung ngo // rtag bde sdu dag bsngal bral dgur gyis// brtson ra 'di na g.yo sgyu can// bdud ni khyed la rnam par 'tshe// ji ltar
293a5(mdo sde): nga yis bshad pa bzhin// thams cad kyang ni gzung ba ra gyis// yang de'i tshe drang srong thub pa'i gnas rta na dukle dang klu chen po pho dang mo dang // khye'u dang / bu
293a6(mdo sde): mo gang dag thams cad 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo rab tu sbyar te// 'di skad ces smraso// 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ chos thams cad
293a7(mdo sde): kyi dbang gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal sol bar mdzad pa// bde ba thams cad sbyin par mdzad pa// dga' ba thams cad bskyed par mdzad
293a8(mdo sde): par shes rab thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// rtag tu byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa// thugs thams cad kyis khyab pa// 'phrin las thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa/ 
293b1(mdo sde): lam thams cad ston pa// yang dag pa'i mig gsung ba// lha dang klu rnams kyis mchod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag 'tshalo// srid pa gsum gyi dgra bcom pa mchod pa thams/ 
293b2(mdo sde): cad 'os pa bdag cag thams cad sdug bsngal zhing brtson ra 'dir 'phags lags na// 'di nas bdag cag thar par mdzad par gsol// klu de dag lhan cig gnas
293b3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi klu de dag thams cad sngon gyi lus kyi gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du bkod de gnas de nas 'gro bar ni ma nus so// de dag thams cad
293b4(mdo sde): kyis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba la smras pa// de bzhi na gshegs pa de ni bden te// sems can thams cad la bde bar bzhed pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba'i
293b5(mdo sde): chos nyid yin no// de la bdag cag skyabasu nye bar gan so// 'di nas myur du bzhud cig/ bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las bdag cag thar par mdzod cig
293b6(mdo sde): skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces smos so// de bzhin gshegs pa drang srong sems can thams cad la phan pa dang // bde ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i rgyu mthun thams cad
293b7(mdo sde): mkhyen pa thub pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rnam par ldog par bya ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyis lam rnam par dag
293b8(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sems can yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba nas// sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi bar du thob par bya ba'i phyir/ dang por ma byung ba
294a1(mdo sde): la dmigs pa dang / nyan thos dang / thun mong ba sems can la dmigs pa'i gnas mchog bstan to// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
294a2(mdo sde): chen po slob dpon la rag las pa rnams la/ rgyu las yang dag par byung ba dang / so sor brtag pa la dmigs pa tshangs pa'i gnas pa bstan to// da ltar de bzhin gshegs
294a3(mdo sde): bde ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed grangs med pa/ dpag tu med pa rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed na/ theg pa bla na med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzog
294a4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam sa dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i phyir dang / bdud bzhi pa rdul ba'i
294a5(mdo sde): phyir dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi'/ dpa'i phyir/ chos kyi khrus mdzad do// da ltar shin tu kun tu rtog pa'i nyon mongs tshegs kyi sems can gyi
294a6(mdo sde): khams la dmigs pa kun+da nas ldang ba med pa/ rgyu ba med pa/ gzhi med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan ma med pa/ chags pa med pa/ rnam par bzhag pa med pa/ rdul med
294a7(mdo sde): pa mun pa med pa snang ba med pa/ gzung ba med pa/ gsal byed med pa/ spyod pa med pa/ tha mi dang pa nyid ces bya ba nas/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang
294a8(mdo sde): 'byung po thams cad dang / mig gi rang bzhin tshor ba po med pa'i srid pa zhes pa'i bar nas/ yid kyi rang bzhin tshor ba med pa'i sred pa'i bar la smon pa med pa dang / mngon
294b1(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa med pa dang / 'jug pa med pa'i chos dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / de bzhin nyid 'dres pa med pa dang / gang 'jug pa med
294b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi dbyings don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis sgrol ba phyed pa'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa la
294b3(mdo sde): dmigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dag la yongasu sbyang ba byas pa/ sems na
294b4(mdo sde): mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ ma chags pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ lta ba thams cadabago chags kyi nyon mongs pa yang dag par bcom pa
294b5(mdo sde): rnams la/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa ston to// kye drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang / klu'i rgyal po lus
294b6(mdo sde): 'bigs pa'i khab ces bya ba dang / klu yi rgyal po zla ba la gtsub pa zhes bya ba dang / klu yi rgyal po rin chen skyong zhes bya ba de dag/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba// 
294b7(mdo sde): sngon bstsags pa'i smon lam yang dag par rje su dran pas// de dag snang ba dang / rnam par bgying ba dang ldan po'i gzungs thob par gyur to// de'i tshe klu gzhan brgyad cu
294b8(mdo sde): rtsa bzhi ni/ byang chub kyi spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bstsogs pa'i smon lam yang dag par rje su dran pas/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to// 
295a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' skar ma la dga' ba la/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// khyod gzhung la snying rje chen po thob pa gang gis/ 'dir bdag cag
295a2(mdo sde): bdud kyi 'ching ba 'di las yongasu thar par bgyid pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po thob pa de la/ bodag cig gi tshig gis gsol ba thob shig/ de bzhin du bya/ 
295a3(mdo sde): zhes smras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba/ drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'khor drang srong stong phrag mang po dang / de nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ngo // 
295a4(mdo sde): 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las brgyad do// // bcom
295a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das la klu thams cad skyabasu nye bar gnas pa bdud sdig can gyis thos te/ shas cher 'khrugs shing skrag la/ rgya shug gi 'dab ma bzhin du/ lus
295a6(mdo sde): rab tu 'dar zhing lus rdul nas lag pa gnyis sgreng ste/ 'di skad ces smras// lag 'gro skyabs ni skyabasu dong // skye dgu thams cad slongs gyur cing // 'chi med lam la gzhog/ 
295a7(mdo sde): byed pa// mi bzad g.yo sgyu can la ltos// de'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo// mun brel ma zhes bya ba nges// 'di skad ces smraso// sems can gang dag thos tsam gyis// dge sbyong la ni
295a8(mdo sde): skyabasu mchis// gang dge de yi tshig thos shing // de mthong ba lta smos ci 'tshal// brtson pa sna tshogs sbyor ba yin// khyod kyis yun ni ring du gzigs// bka' mching sna tshogs
295b1(mdo sde): lhan cig mdzad// de yi sgra ni ma slabs sam// bdud kyis slar smras pa// dge sbyong go'u tam brtan pa yin// rang bzhin mkhas pa chen po ste// stong pa'i chos la yang dag zhugs// 
295b2(mdo sde): rgal nas skye dgu sgrol bar byed// bral mas smras pa// stong pa la ni gang zhugs pa// bdud rnams bye bas mi bskyed// byang grol bde ba sbyin bgyid pa// de la bdag ni skyabs su/ 
295b3(mdo sde): 'chi// mtshan nyid ma mchis ldan pa yi// de bzhin nyid la gang brten cing // ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin// de la bdag ni skyabasu 'chi// rgyud bdag gis bslab par bgyi// sems
295b4(mdo sde): can thams cad rnam par grol// chos rnams kun la da dbang sgyur ba'i// bla med sangs rgyas grub par shog/ de bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya snying bdud kyi gnas der 'khod
295b5(mdo sde): nas// byang chub tu smon lam btab par gyur te// bdud sdig can shas ches 'khrugs shing dngang ste/ rmongs na sa/ stobs kyi shugs kyis 'chag sar zhugs te
295b6(mdo sde): bdud kyi stobs kyi tshe 'phrul gyis byin gyis brlab pa de lta bu byin gyis brlabs so// gang gis drang srong skar ma la dga' ba de nas song nas ring po ma lon par// drang srong thub pa'i
295b7(mdo sde): gnas rten der bdud kyi gnas de nas// na mkha' las rdo'i char pa me rab tu 'bar ba'i char mngon par rab tu dbab par brtsams te// klu thams cad thal bar rlag par
295b8(mdo sde): 'dod na// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus der me tog gi char rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu bab ste/ klu thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur to// dga' khyab mas smras pa/ kye bdud
296a1(mdo sde): kyi bu mo dag khyod ltos shig/ 'dzam bu'i gling der dge sbyong go'u tam la klu gang dag skyabasu dong ba de dag thams cad kyang 'dir sdug bsngal mang pos gnod
296a2(mdo sde): par byed na/ gang dag 'dir 'khod nas/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skyabasu dong ba/ rang gi bu mo khyod la lta smos kyang ci dgos// bdud kyi bu mos 'di skad ces smraso// sangs rgya
296a3(mdo sde): skyabasu sems can su 'gro ba// bdud rnams bye bas gsad par mi nus te// tshul khrims nyams shing blo ni 'khrugs zin kyang // de ni nges par skye ba'i pha rol 'gro/ ston pa la
296a4(mdo sde): ni me tog gcig gtor zhing // byang chub smon lam pa rtan po bskyed pas na// de ni bdud rnams du mas gsang mi nus// nem nur med por 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/ 
296a5(mdo sde): de yi bslab pa'i gzhi ni gcig blangs shing // tshig gi/ don gcig tsam yang nyan byed na// byang chub phyir ni sa/ mas kyang skyed pa de// sems can kha la sgyur
296a6(mdo sde): nur med// yab klu tshogs 'di mthong ste sangs rgyas kyis// der ni me tog char pa sna tshogs 'bebs// sangs rgyas yul gcig gis ni khyod la bsngos// der ni ci yang nus par
296a7(mdo sde): ma gyur to// gang gis sems can de dag sdig zad cing // bdag cag gi ni las kyi sgrib 'byang ba// chung ngu lung bstan pa ni de nyam pa'i// rig pa gcig kyang der ni ston pas
296a8(mdo sde): gsungs// bdud sdig can shas cher 'khrugs shing gshe ste// sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes nas// mya ngan gyi khang par gcig pu 'dug// de'i tshe byang chub sems dang / 
296b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' ba// bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs pa'i gnas pa dmigs pa med pa'i gtam gyi tha mar 'jug thog su bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa der
296b2(mdo sde): phyin te 'du go/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba zhes bya ba nas// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to zhe
296b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar du'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags bshad par gsol// gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi de/ 
296b4(mdo sde): dgis sngon bdag cag gnyis bram ze'i khye'u gnyi su gyur pa na// lus kyi sladu rgyal brgyal gyi lha la nongs pa ba gyis pas dgum pa la thug ste// brtson rar spu la n+da/ 
296b5(mdo sde): zla ba phyed zas dang bral zhing // bcing ba lngas bcing sa nas// de bzhin gshegs pa man 'da' ra ba'i bsung la la yid la gzhan mi sems par gsol ba
296b6(mdo sde): btab pa lagaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa man 'da' ra ba'i bsung bdag cag la thugs brtse bas rang gi gnas kyi shul kar bzhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi
296b7(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lung bstan pa rgya ga dag par kyi sa pa ga 'a la na de/ zungs sngags bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus btson ra der bdag cag gi rna lam du don dang bcas/ tshig
296b8(mdo sde): 'bru dang bcas par gragaso// gsang sngags yid la bgyid pa de dag gis/ bdag cag dga' ba dang dad pa yang dag par bskyad nas/ de'i tshe bdag cag gi mthong ba'i chos
297a1(mdo sde): la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad dang / las kyi
297a2(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi
297a3(mdo sde): ba'i bar dang / nye bar spyod pa dang / long spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i 'du byed pas pa'i sgrib pa dang / bas mos bzhin du srid par skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
297a4(mdo sde): yongasu dag pa rnamasu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa yongasu bas shi dang / der bdag cag bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la dbagyid pa'i gzungs sngags thos pa tsam gyi mod la
297a5(mdo sde): 'grin pa 'ching ba lnga las grol te/ btson ra nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi yul thob par gyur cing / de nas na mkha las chas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
297a6(mdo sde): man dar ba'i gsung gi thad du nye bar phyin to// de nas shi 'phos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ri bo'i 'od ces bgyi bar skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sprin gyi
297a7(mdo sde): mdog gi thad du rab tu byung nas zhes bgyi ba nas/ slan chad bskal pa dpag tu ma mchis par/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa rnamasu bdag cag ma skyeso zhes pa'i bar du'i/ de ba
297a8(mdo sde): dung ltar sgrib par sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mdzad thams cad 'di dang 'og min la thug pa'i bar gyis thams cad/ sems can mi dang mi ma lags pa de dag tu ma mchis pas khyab
297b1(mdo sde): ste de dag ni las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi bsgrib pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis zin to zhes bgyi ba nas/ sangs rgyas
297b2(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongasu dag pa rnamasu las yongasu ma dag pa dag gis bsgribs te mchi bar mi nus pa lag so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du'o// sems can gyi las kyi gzungs sngags thos
297b3(mdo sde): ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mong
297b4(mdo sde): pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / sems cadan gyi sgrib pa dang / sbyin pa'i sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba nas/ shes rab kyi sgrib pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar dang / nye bar
297b5(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / longs spyod kyi sgrib pa dang / dge ba bcu 'i las kyi lam gyi sgrib pa mchis pa'i thams cad/ dang / thos ma thag tu skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / sangs rgya
297b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing yongasu dag po dag tu 'gro ba'i sgrib pa mchis pa thams cad yongasu bas par 'gyur ba dang / chos bstan pa des sen rnams bzod pa dang / ting nge
297b7(mdo sde): 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs thob par 'gyur ba dang / ji srid 'tshe ba'i mtha'i bar du der 'chi ba'i dus bgyi// sems can rnams ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du/ bsams
297b8(mdo sde): bzhin du srid par skye ba len par rngo thogs par 'gyur ba dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / rtag par rgyun tu brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
298a1(mdo sde): yang dag par len pa dang / log par mi ltung ba'i chos can rnamasu 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi
298a2(mdo sde): la mngon par brtson pa dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim gro bgyi ba dang / bsam gtan gyis rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa/ 
298a3(mdo sde): bsgom pa la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad du/ bla na med pa'i yong su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du chos nga dag dang bral bar mi 'gyur bar bcom
298a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das de sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba'i da slad du/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la bgyid pa'i gzungs sngags de
298a5(mdo sde): legs par bshad par gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa leg so zhes bya ba
298a6(mdo sde): nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba'i bar du/ dge slong ngam/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa can su la la theg pa gsum las/ theg pa gla
298a7(mdo sde): yang rung bas srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgal bar 'dod pa de ni myur du theg pa yongasu rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa yin la/ sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms par 'dod pa yin/ 
298a8(mdo sde): thos pa thams cad kun tu 'dzin par 'dod pa yin/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len thams cad la yong su thar par 'dod pa yin/ bstan pa bsrung bar 'dod
298b1(mdo sde): pa yin/ snyan pa 'dod pa dang / rnyed pa 'dod pa dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba mang po 'dod pa dang / dbang phyug 'dod pa dang / gzugs 'dod pa dang / stobs 'dod pa dang / 'khor
298b2(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang / nor dang / 'bru 'dod pa dang / thu bo 'dod pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'os par 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus 'dod pa yin/ rtag tu lus
298b3(mdo sde): dang ngag dang / yid kyis kun tu gnon par 'dod pa yin zhing myur du bsam gtan dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes
298b4(mdo sde): pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / gzungs dang / bzo da pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub par 'dod pa yino// de ltar yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
298b5(mdo sde): pa shas cher 'phongs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par 'gro ba'i sgrib pa rnams kyis bsams bzhin du srid pa/ 
298b6(mdo sde): blangs pa de'i bar gyis/ myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs de lta bu de dag bsgrub par mi nus te/ las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu de dag gis zin pa'i phyir ro// gang zag de
298b7(mdo sde): khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos shing / kha zas gtsang ma dang / mal gtsang ma der skyil mo krung ngam/ 'chag pas kyang rung ste/ rje su 'thun pa'i tshes brgyad la sangs
298b8(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs yid la byed pas/ gzhan yid la mi sems par bya ba nas/ las gzhan mi byed cing sems rnam par g.yengs pa ma yin pa'i bar gyis/ re shig mtshan
299a1(mdo sde): gcig gam zhes bya ba nas/ mtshan bdun gyi bar du gnas par byed na/ des rang gi sku byad du sangs rgyas mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gal te sangs rgyas
299a2(mdo sde): kyi sku'i gzugs chung ngur rtog par byed na/ chung ngu kho nar mthong ngo // yang na tshad med par rtogs par byed na/ gzugs kyi sku tshad med pa yang dag par rje su mthong ngo // des
299a3(mdo sde): mtshon thog thag mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong ngo // mtshan gang las kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba mthong ba'i mtshan gcig po de nyid la yid kyis rjesu bltas nas/ gsang
299a4(mdo sde): sngags 'di dag brjod do// tad+ya thA/ badz+ri ma b+ha/ badz+ri ma b+ha/ ud pA da bya ya/ badz+ri ma b+ha/ sna ba pha rA/ a nu na ta thA tA/ b+hu ta ko Ti/ badz+ri ma b+ha swA hA// ji srid du des kha dog
299a5(mdo sde): sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba rnam par spen nas/ de nas byung ste/ rang gi mtho'i spyi bor zhugs pa de srid du des ma/ tshan gcig la rnam par mi g.yeng ba'i yid kyis rjes su
299a6(mdo sde): bltas nas/ tshig 'di dag brjod cing mi skrag par bya/ mi dngang par bya'o// rang gi lus mer rnam par blta bar bya ste/ ji ltar zhe na/ des kha dog sngon po'i 'od 'phro ba
299a7(mdo sde): rang gi lus kyi yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad du 'gro ba mthong nas/ rang gi lus thams cad rab tu 'bar bar mthong zhes bya ba nas/ thal ba bzhin du mthong ngo zhes
299a8(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar dang / phyogs bzhir rlung gis ma lus par khyer ba stong pa bzhin du mthong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ phyogs thams cad du de la gzugs snang ba gang yang mi 'byung
299b1(mdo sde): ba 'di ni de'i thams cad sgrub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu su la la sangs rgyas rje su dran pa de lta bu bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa'i gzungs sngags shin tu bsgoms shI/ 
299b2(mdo sde): mchod sbyin legs par byas la/ shin tu yid la byas nas/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa zhes bya ba nas/ ma lus pa'i
299b3(mdo sde): bar du yongasu byang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang / dam pa'i chos spangs pa rnams dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtog so// de 'dod
299b4(mdo sde): na de ltar nyin mtshan gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung tha/ thams cad dang / phyi rol pa'i bstan bcos thad/  rig pa'i gnas bco brgyad dang / gzhan yang gang dag sta/ 
299b5(mdo sde): dngagasu byas pa'i rnams des the tsom med par shin tu 'dzi na par 'gyur ro// de nyin mtshan gtsigs bsam gtan bzhi dang / gong ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / tshangs
299b6(mdo sde): pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang / so sor yang dag pa rig pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi sgom par 'dod na/ des shin tu bsgoms pa yi no// de 'dod na skad
299b7(mdo sde): cig gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / sems kyi spyod pa rab tu shes par 'gyur ro// de 'dod na skad cig gis na mkha'
299b8(mdo sde): thams cad rang gi lus sam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku 'am/ brgya byin gyi bar ram/ tshangs pa'i bor ram/ sred med kyi bu'i bar ram/ dbang phyug chen po'i bar ram/ rgyal chen bzhi'i bar
300a1(mdo sde): ram/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bar ram/ chu'i bar ram/ me'i ba ra ram/ sa'i bar gyis gang bar byed do// de 'dod na skad cig gcig gis na mkha' thams cad me tog
300a2(mdo sde): gis bar dang / rin po che'i 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi bar dag gis gang
300a3(mdo sde): bar byed do// sus bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa de lta bu shin tu bsgoms pa yin zhing / shin tu 'dris par byas la/ shin tu yid la/ 
300a4(mdo sde): byas pa yin pa de'i las tshad med pa de lta bu ma lus par bya dang bar 'gyuraro// de de ltar bsod nams dang / sto das dang / brtson 'grus dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs
300a5(mdo sde): dang / bzod pa dang / rnam par rol pa dang / mngon par shes bar tshad med par 'gyuraro// des de ltar gang ya nga rung ba dag yong su rdzogs par byas na/ myur du 'khor
300a6(mdo sde): ba las thar par 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa rnams ni ma gtog so// de lta yin yang mtshams med pa
300a7(mdo sde): byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa de yang / bdun phrag bdun du bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa/ sangs rgyas rje su dran pa
300a8(mdo sde): 'di 'dir ji ltar bstan pa bzhin sgom par byed na/ bdun phrag bdun po de 'das nas/ las kyi sgrib pa sum tsam zad cing / lhag ma skyon med par ma lus par byang bar
300b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran bsgom pa de lta bu de ni de ltar don che ba yin// su la la bzhi pa rab kyi mtha' gnas yid la byed pa// 
300b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rje su dran pa 'di de ltar thos pa tsam rna lam du thos na/ de la mi 'am/ mi ma yin pa'i bar de nye bar brtags nas dad pa dang / dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba skye'o// 
300b3(mdo sde): de brtson ra'i 'ching ba dam po las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// gang su dag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'i sems can thams cad kyang / sdug bsngal dag las yongasu thar par 'gyur
300b4(mdo sde): ro longs spyod kyi sdug bsngal dang / chad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / g.yang sa dang / me dang / chu dang / dug dang / dgra thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / nad kyi
300b5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa dang / gnas kyi 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po'i/ 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ bran gyi 'jig sa pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i jigs
300b6(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i bar las yongasu thar par 'gyur ro// bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro// su sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa de lta bu thos pa tsam rna lam du grags na/ de la nye bar brtags
300b7(mdo sde): nas dad pa skyes te/ de ltar don che zhing phan yon che ba yin no// su ji ltar bsta shi de bzhin du sgom pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon yongasu
300b8(mdo sde): sbyang ba spyad pa/ dkrigs pa khrag khrig brgya stong brgyad cu rtsa drug ni/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i ting 'dzin thob par gyur to// ji ltar sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon+tan de dag dang
301a1(mdo sde): yang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe srog chags khrag khrig brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa thob gyur to// de'i tshe sems can dpag
301a2(mdo sde): yas pa kha cig ni mthar gyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor dang / 'bras bu dang po gnas par gyur to// kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar thob par gyur to// de'i tshe sems
301a3(mdo sde): can dpag yas pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngon ma bskyed pa'i sems bskyed// mun bral ma la sogs pa bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang
301a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdud kyi gnasu 'khod bzhin sem das yongasu sbyang ba yi sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i lung bstan pa 'di thams cad thoso// thos nas kyang bung
301a5(mdo sde): med kyi dngos po mi snang bar gyur te/ skyes pa nyid thob bo// gang dag sngon yongasu sbyang ba byas pa de dag thad sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i tinge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur
301a6(mdo sde): to/ ji skad sngar bshad pa bzhin du yon+ta na de dag dang ldan par gyur to// de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/ tshangs pa chen po re ra
301a7(mdo sde): yang bye ba brgya stong phrag mang pos yongasu bskor cing / bye ba brgya phrag mang pos 'dun gyis bltas te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa bye ba brgya phrag mang pos yongasu bskor
301a8(mdo sde): nas de dag bdud kyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa bkod pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du babs te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos
301b1(mdo sde): dang / byug pa dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dag dang / rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / chos gos sna tshogs gtor cing / mngon par gtor te/ bcom
301b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'phags pa 'dus
301b3(mdo sde): pa chen po nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu gcig pa las/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa'i le'u ste dgu pa/ rdzog s+ho// // de nas bco ldan
301b4(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen nga po skar ma la dga' ba la 'di skad ces bka' sprul pa/ rigs kyi bu lag 'gro'i tshegs thams cad
301b5(mdo sde): kyi zhal lnga byos shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka 'a sprul pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dus lags
301b6(mdo sde): kyis gshegs shig/ bcom ldan 'das gang khyod kyi mdzad pa mdzod cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas
301b7(mdo sde): lag 'gro'i las bstan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongasu 'byung ba lung bstan pa bshad pa rab tu bstan pa'i dus yin// yang de'i tshe lha thams cad ces bya ba nas/ grul
301b8(mdo sde): bum thams cad ces bya ba'i bar dag me tog dang / spos dang / rin po che dang / ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spud pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
302a1(mdo sde): ba dan gyi char pa dag rab tu 'bebs shing / sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra 'byin la mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i yon+dan gyis
302a2(mdo sde): bstod nas/ bcom ldan 'das gdan las mngon par bzhengs te/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ga la bar byang phyogasu nye bar gsheg so// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs ni spyod
302a3(mdo sde): pa'i lha thams cad kyis kyang / gang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis bdun du'angar cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor te/ ri rab kyi rtse mo
302a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa'ang bzhed par sheso// de ltar rig nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ ras bcos bu sna
302a5(mdo sde): tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i me tog bkram pa'i the/ ma skas sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// brtse/ ma ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs pa gsol/ 
302a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan 'phrul rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi them skas can ngan sbrul gyi snying po'i phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa dag sprul nas/ 'di skad ces
302a7(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas rnams la gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu 'phrul dgas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi gser gyi them skas can danas
302a8(mdo sde): mchog sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha'i bu yongasu dga' ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das
302b1(mdo sde): kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi bai dUr+ya'i them skas dus kyi rjesu 'brang ba'i can ngan gyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pa sprul nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them smras las
302b2(mdo sde): gshegs par gsol/ lha'i zur ba 'brub dral gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lA rdzas kyi b+hedUts+tsha'i themasas/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma sna tshogs bkram pasngal nas/ 'di skad ces
302b3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them skas las gshegs par gsol/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir mu tog dmar po'i them
302b4(mdo sde): nas/ lha rdzas kyi can dan gyi phye ma sna tshogs dang / rin du'adra ba sna tshogs kyis yongasu khengs pa smral nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi them
302b5(mdo sde): skas las gshegs par gsol/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir/ lha rdzas kyi rin po tshe rdo'i snying po las byas pa lha rdzas kyi ras bcos du sna chos
302b6(mdo sde): kyis rab tu khebs pa'i them skas de nyid sprul nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ lha ma yin gyi
302b7(mdo sde): dbang po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha rdzas kyi spug gi them skas lha rdzas kyi gser gyi phye ma sna tshogs kyis yongasu khebs pa de nyid sprul nas/ 'di skad
302b8(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi them skas las ri rab kyi rtse mor gshegs par gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de dag la thugs brtse nas/ bdag nyid 'dun pa
303a1(mdo sde): bdag dang 'dra ba sangs rgyas kyi sku bdun sprul nas/ sangs rgyas brgyad po de dag lha'i dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po tha~Md kyi mdun du nyan thos kyis mdun
303a2(mdo sde): du 'dar cing / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po de lta bus ri rab kyi rtse mor gsheg so// sangs rgyas brgyad po de
303a3(mdo sde): dag mchog tu lhan ne lhang nger ri rab kyi rtse mor bzhugaso// sangs rgyas kyi sku re re las 'od kyi 'od gzer 'di lta bu byung ste/ dper na/ zla ba dang / nyi ma bye ba phrag stong shar ba
303a4(mdo sde): bzhi no// klu gang dag drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten du/ lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de mthong nasaH/ dang ltad mor gyur te/ gcig la gcig dris pa/ snang ba/ 
303a5(mdo sde): chen po'i nang na rten pa ri rab kyi rtse mor la gnas pa da rgyad po de dag ga las 'ongs/ dga' bo dang / nyed ga' gnyis kyis smras pa/ ri rab rtse la lha rnams lhan
303a6(mdo sde): cig tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa 'di gnas pa// kun mchog lha yi dbang phyug shin tu mkhas pa rnams kyi rig pa'i pha rol phyin// bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas
303a7(mdo sde): dpal gyi gzi brjid kyis ni longs spyod byed// 'ching ba rnams las thar par byed kyis kun kyang de la mgo bos phyag 'tshal cig/ ma dros pas 'di skad ces smra so// de 'di
303a8(mdo sde): ma yin 'di bdud sdig can 'gro gtso 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul can// khyed la snying brtse ba yis bu dang skye bos yongs skor 'di na gnas pa yin// 'di na gang zhig la la
303b1(mdo sde): 'dod khams sdug bsngal bkres shing skom pa'i nad kyi 'jigs// sems can de yang rab tu thar byed khyed cag myur du sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed// sa'i dbang
303b2(mdo sde): phyag gis 'di skad ces smrasaso// de lta ma yin 'di rgyal lha dbang 'thab bral dga' ldan 'phrul pa gzhan 'phrul pa// de dag khyed la snying brtse ba yis ri la gnas shing klu yi
303b3(mdo sde): tshegs la lha// bdag cag yongasu skyobs shes kun gyis gsang mthor de dag la ni 'odod pos// de dag rtag tu bde dang ldan paso khyed cag brtson ra dag nas zhi bar byed/ rgya
303b4(mdo sde): mtshos smras pa/ de dag ma yin 'di ni lha dbang brgya byi na tshegs bcas gzi brjid lhang nge ba// de ni gling ba dezhi'i nang na chos dang ldan pa su yod brtse ba'i yid kyis
303b5(mdo sde): lha// khyed cag thams cad byams pa'i yid du gyis la khro ba myur du dor bar gyis// de yis myur du lag 'gro thar byed 'di nas 'jigs pa kun las thar par
303b6(mdo sde): byed// shin tu brtan gyis smras pa/ de lta ma yin 'di kun gzugs rten lha tshigs bsam gtan bde ldan gzi brjid can// sems can rnams kyi che du drang srong 'dir 'dzeg 'khod
303b7(mdo sde): nas brtse bas phyogs rnamasu// myur du srog chags rnams kyi 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi byed chos chu'i cher pa 'bebs// lha'i yid kyis thams cad de la phyag 'tshol 'di nas
303b8(mdo sde): bdag cag thar par byed// klu lus 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smraso// 'di ni gzugs na rten pa'i lha min bzhi po 'di kun bdud kyi 'byor pa yin// lus ngan skyes
304a1(mdo sde): mchog bdud rtsi'i skom dang rgyu bar brtags pa 'di dag gnas// gnod sbyin sde dang bcas pas yongs bskor phyogs bzhi skyong byed sdig pa'i skye bo grol/ 
304a2(mdo sde): de dag ni bdag cag sems zhan mthong nas 'di nas myur du thar par byed// klu rin chen skyong gis 'di skad ces smra so// de dag ma yin de na mgo bregs ngur smrig gos can 'khod
304a3(mdo sde): par snang ba yin// de dag la ni kun lha thal mo sbyar 'khod skar ma'i nang na zla ba bzhin// bdun po de dag cher bsgribs brtul zhugs brtan pa mgo bregs bdag gis mthong ba
304a4(mdo sde): yin// ngur smrig gos bgos mtshan gyis rab brgyan 'a/ gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'ongs par mthong // klu lu sa 'bigs pa'i khab kyis 'di skad ces smra so// 'di ni bdag
304a5(mdo sde): nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten 'dren pa yin te nga la de ltar sna/ nga // sems can rnams kyi mnyam gnyen 'gro ba skyes pa sdug bsngal rgya mtsho sel byed pa// gang dag lhan cig/ 
304a6(mdo sde): snang ba drang srong gzhan rnams kyang ni de yis sprul pa yin// bdag cag la ni brtse bas 'dir gnas khyed cag sdug bsngal rnams las thar par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das
304a7(mdo sde): ri rab kyi rtse mo de la bzhugs ma thag tu// ri rab dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhir 'khor brgya stong yod par gyur to// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams
304a8(mdo sde): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'og min gyi lha'i gnas la thug pa'i bor man chad/ sna tshogs pa blta na sdug
304b1(mdo sde): pa dpagasargya stong du mar spras pa/ de srid cig sprul te/ de ni bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyan dang / spud pa
304b2(mdo sde): dang gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan par sprul pa yin// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po
304b3(mdo sde): brgya byin la bos te bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed ni nga dang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang
304b4(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / bdud/ rnams dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa
304b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis shin tu longs spyad zin to// de bzhin du ltar ri rab 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis shin tu longs spyod zin to// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
304b6(mdo sde): kyi zhing thams cad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lha dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyis shin tu longs spyod zin to// ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i
304b7(mdo sde): 'byung po khyed la phan pa dang / bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag la thugs brtse bar mdzad na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das
304b8(mdo sde): la phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / ri rab long spyad par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di thams cad na gal te yang gang su dag bdud dam/ brgya
305a1(mdo sde): byin namatshungs pa'am/ lha'i dbang po'am/ klu yi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'am/ dri za'i dbang po'am/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ namA
305a2(mdo sde): lding gi dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po'am/ lto phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/ sems can dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa lha'i drang srong gi bar zhes bgyi ba nas/ mi'i
305a3(mdo sde): drang srong gri bar de dag thams cad 'dir lhags par gyur na/ 'dir bdag cag la shas cher phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lag so// der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas mdzur
305a4(mdo sde): pa mdzad de/ de'i zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'od gzar kha dog sngon/ po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs
305a5(mdo sde): byung ngo // 'od gzer de dag gshegs nas/ bdud kyi gan sa bye ba phrag brgya dang / brgya byin gyi gnas bye ba phrag brgya dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa zhes bya ba nis/ 
305a6(mdo sde): lholha'i dbang po thams cad kyi gnas dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas dang / drang srong gi gnas bye ba phrag brgya'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di ji snyed pa thams cad 'ong gzer de dag zhug so// 
305a7(mdo sde): de dang de dag tu sems can dbang che bar grags pa/ dbang che bar grags pa bdud dmo zhes bya ba nas/ drang srong rnams shes bya ba'i bar du ming du brtags pa dang / de dag
305a8(mdo sde): thams cad la rab tu go bar mdzad nas/ bdud ces bya ba nas/ drang srong zhes bya ba'i bar de dang / de dag de nas chas te/ bcon ldan 'das ga la ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku
305b1(mdo sde): brgyad po de dag ga la bar skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig gis/ 'dir ri rab kyi rtse mor 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa dag rgyun bcad nas/ bka' stsal pa/ nga'i
305b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab bya ba phrag brgya ji skad yod pa thams cad kyi nang na/ ri rab 'di ni mchog dang / phul yin par nges bshad de/ ri rab 'di ni 'das
305b3(mdo sde): pa chen po thams cad kyis longs spyod pa yin zhing / ri rab thams cad kyi rgyal po yin no// de thos nas brgya byin ki'u shi ka dang / zhes bya ba nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhwa
305b4(mdo sde): bya ba'i bar mchog tu yid bde ba dang rangs pa skye so// bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus klu yi rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag drang srong thud pa'i gnas rten de nas dong ste/ klu'i
305b5(mdo sde): rgyal po rgya mtsho ni 'di nas lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'jug mas 'dug nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'ba' shi ga
305b6(mdo sde): la lta'o zhes bya ba nas/ klu yi rgyal po rin chen skong zhes bya ba nub phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / klu yi rgyal po lus 'bigs pa'i khab ni byang phyogs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang
305b7(mdo sde): klu yi rgyal po zla ba la rtsub pa ni shar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du 'jug ma bzhag nas zhes bya ba nas/ ri rab kyi rtse me'i bar du de'i mgo bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das
305b8(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// klu lhag ma khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dpag tu med pa de dag ni/ de nas 'dong bar ma nuso// de dag thams cad kyis gsang stod de/ 'di
306a1(mdo sde): skad ces spra so// brtson ra 'di nas bdag cag yongasu bsgrub par gsol/ yongasu thar par mdzad par gsol/ klu yi rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' gnyis bcom ldan
306a2(mdo sde): 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo nas 'dir gshegs shing / gnas rten 'dir bzhugaso nas/ klu rnams la chos ston par 'gyur snyam ste/ de dag gnyis gnas rten nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo'i bar du
306a3(mdo sde): srid kyi rang gi lus sprul to// de nas brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ klu de dag ni lus nub cing 'dus te reg pa gdug pa yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil dag ral
306a4(mdo sde): bar gyur na/ mi rung ngo snyam nas/ des lag 'gro'i lus lha rdzas kyi ras bcos bu dag gis yongasu g.yo/ gas shing / mgo la yang can dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / 
306a5(mdo sde): ma la'i lo ma'i phye mas yongasu g.yogs te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dag mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten de/ rgyar dpag
306a6(mdo sde): tshad bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sprul to// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i dbusu lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i ras bcos bu dang / rgyan dang / nor bu dang / 
306a7(mdo sde): rin po che rnams kyi gdan dag bting ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mo la bzhugs nas/ kun shes ko'u di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ ji nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing
306a8(mdo sde): mi mjed thams cad du chud pa thams cad kyis thos par de la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi cho 'phrul gyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs de lta bus chos ston to// ko'u drir+ya gang mig gi
306b1(mdo sde): skye ba dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye ba'o// 'di ni nang dang / srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi gnas pa'o// 'di ni rga
306b2(mdo sde): shi'i 'byung ba'o// ko'u di n+ya gang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid kyi skye ba dang / gnas dang / 'byung ba dang / nye bar len pa la mngon par zhen pa 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi skye'o// 
306b3(mdo sde): 'di ni nad dang srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyis gnas pa'o// 'di ni rga shi'i 'byung ba'o// ko'u di n+ya gang mig gi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa dang / nye bar len pa nye b.ro zhi
306b4(mdo sde): ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i ya ngan lag rnams kyi nye bar zhi ba'o// 'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o// ko'u di n+ya gang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / 
306b5(mdo sde): yid kyi 'gog pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang / nub pa dang / nye ba ra len pa'i rnam par zhi ba 'di ni sdug bsngal gyi 'gog pa'o// 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag rnams kyi nye bar
306b6(mdo sde): zhi ba'o// 'di ni rga shi'i nub pa'o// chos gang gis nga lha dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig
306b7(mdo sde): rten na/ phul yin par grags pa dang / byams pa chen pos mchog yin par grags pa dang / snying rje chen pos dam pa yin par grags pa dang / 'khor ba'i pha rol phyin pas bla na
306b8(mdo sde): med par grags pa dang / sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par grags pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / 
307a1(mdo sde): yang dag par sdom pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongasu bsgoms pa'i rgyu 'thun pa'i chos de ni ngas sems
307a2(mdo sde): thams cad la rgya cher bstan to// gsal bar mdzad do// ston pa thugs brtse ba can/ phan par bzhed par gang nyan thos rnams la mdzad pa ni nges mdzad zin te/ da khyod cag gri/ 
307a3(mdo sde): bya ba yin no// rga shi'i mthar dbyung ba'i phyir dgon pa rnams dang / shing drung dang / dur khrod dang / ri dang / ri khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal de dag tu phyis 'gyod pa can
307a4(mdo sde): du gyur na mi rung gis sgoms shing / rtsol cig/ nged kyi/ rje su bstan pa ni 'di yino// bcom ldan 'das kyi// sa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sangs rgyas
307a5(mdo sde): kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i grong bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya gang yin pa thams cad du gling bzhi pa re rer yang / sem sa can dkrigs pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po de dag
307a6(mdo sde): gis ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed// kha cig ni ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa rnams la rnam par gnas par gyur to// de bzhin du chos rnams la chos kyi
307a7(mdo sde): mig bskyod do// kha cig ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i bar dang / kha cig
307a8(mdo sde): ni gnod sbyin dbul po nyid kyi bar dang / kha cig ni mi dbul po nyid du 'gro ba'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongasu byang ngo // nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad med par gyur to// sem
307b1(mdo sde): can rnams btson ra nas yongasu thar par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu yi rgyal po rgya mtshos tshigasu bcad de gsol pa// dge ba sna tshogs dri ma med pa'i gser can
307b2(mdo sde): spyod pa rnam dag thugs rjes byug/ lha dang shed las skyes dang lag 'gro'i dam pa nyon mongs rnyog pa sel mdzad pa/ tshul khrims thos rigs sum po phun sum tshogs pa sem
307b3(mdo sde): can thams cad 'dzud pa po// lag 'gro'i tshogs rab thar mdzad thugs rjes brtan po sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs par mdzod// gzhan sems sems can slad du sdug bsngal
307b4(mdo sde): ji ltar btar ba bzhin// lag 'gro skad cig mtha' yasa'adir rmongs sdug bsngal sna tshogs thebs// dgra yis byang chub phyag bgyis brtson brtan skye ba'i dgon pa las
307b5(mdo sde): grol ba// ye shes chab kyis lag 'gro thams cad che/ ma par mdzad du gsol// 'phags pa 'dus pa che/ na po theg pa chen po'i mdo// nyi ma'i snying po'i le'u bcu
307b6(mdo sde): gcig pa las/ ri rab la gshegs pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// // 'phags pa shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sde/ nyi ma'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo// bam po bcu gnyis pa/ 
307b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / rin po che dang / chos gos dag gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / gla dbyangs dag gi rol mo'i sgra 'byin pI
307b8(mdo sde): lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin thams cad sdod pas ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar cing / byang
308a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongasu bskor nas/ drang srong thub pa'i gnas rten gyis dbusu gdan bting ba nyid la bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das la mtsha
308a2(mdo sde): pa'i las bya ba'i phyir/ steng gi na mkha' la lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci thams cad kyis rgyan dang / phye ma sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / 
308a3(mdo sde): rin po che sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab bo// bcom ldan 'das la klu de dag gis kyang / me tog sna tshogs dang / dri tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / ras gos dang / ras bcom
308a4(mdo sde): bu dang / chos gos dang / rgyun sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bye/ das nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom lda na 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ 
308a5(mdo sde): spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la klu yi rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sug las gang dag gi/ 
308a6(mdo sde): sems can rnams klu yi skye gnasu skye lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu yi bdag po las kyi sgrib pa bcus sems can 'byung po rnams myur du klu yi sgyu
308a7(mdo sde): gnasu skye'o// bcu gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mngon par brtson zhing / bla na med pa'i theg pa yongasu tshol ba'i sems dang ldan bdag yin la/ 
308a8(mdo sde): myur du 'dod pa rnams la nyes dmig su lta ba ma yin zhing / shin tu sbyin pa la mngon par brtson la/ lag brkyang ba dag yod de/ de dag smon lam gyi dbang gis klu rnams kyi
308b1(mdo sde): nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag blan med pa'i theg pa yongasu tshol ba'i sems dang ldan zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/ de dag gis
308b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims thams cad rdzogs par skyon med par srung ba ni mi nus so// de dag sems can dmyalo ba dang / yi dgas kyi 'jigs pas skrag nas/ rang gi smon lam gyis/ klu
308b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i theg pa yongasu tshol bar byed cing / shin tu nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dag yod de/ de dag nga rgyal gyi mthus rang
308b4(mdo sde): gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yangs mas can gang dgra bla na med pa'i theg pa'i spyod dpa'i mngon par brtson pa dag yod de/ de dag shin tu
308b5(mdo sde): bamang zhing sems can rnams la rab tu sdang ste/ ded ga ga kho na la brten pas 'chi ba'i dus tham klu rnams kyi nang du smon lam 'debs te/ de dag smon
308b6(mdo sde): lam gyis der skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / yang dag par ldan zhing / snron du gyur pa'i sbyin gnas yongasu btsal ba dang / mchod pa'i sems
308b7(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag rang gi smon lam gyis klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag ser sna can dang / nga rgyal gyi skyon dang ldan pa dag yod de/ de dag
308b8(mdo sde): las des klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal la mngon par dga' zhing / mu cor smra la brdzun du smra ba dag yod de/ de dag las des klu rnams
309a1(mdo sde): kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag sangs rgyas la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yin zhing / chos dang dge 'dun dang / bslab pa dang
309a2(mdo sde): mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas lta bu dang / pha ma rnams la gces par byed pa ma yin pa mang ba dag yod do// de'i tshe de dag nga rgyal gyi rgyu dang / lus dang / ngag dang // 
309a3(mdo sde): yid chung ngus 'khrul pa klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can gang dag nga rgyal dang / gti mug gis zil gyis non cing / ma dul la skyon med pa ma yin par spyod pa dag yod
309a4(mdo sde): de de dag klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// yang sems can ga dang dag nga rgyal dang / phra ma smra ba dang / tshig rtsug po/ smra ba la goms pa dag yod de/ de dag 'chi ba'i dus
309a5(mdo sde): byas nas/ klu rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ bcu po de dag yi na no// chos gzhan gsum dang ldan na klu rnams kyi na nga du skye'o// gsum gang zhe na/ sems can gang dag lus
309a6(mdo sde): dang / ngag dang / yid kyi nyes par spyod pa shin tu dam po dag gis sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dag yod de/ de dag de nas shi 'phos nas/ nyes par spyod bI lhag
309a7(mdo sde): ma chung ngus klu rnams kyi nang du skye'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro rnams dang / de bzhin du yi dgas rnams nas shes bya ba'i bar du ste/ chos gsum po de dag gis sems can klu rnams
309a8(mdo sde): kyi nang du skye'o// rgya mtshos yang gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de de bzhino// btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di na klu gang dag
309b1(mdo sde): longs spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa'i dpal dang ldan pa/ lha dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa nas/ mi smad rims dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar dang / yi dgas dang 'dra bar dag mchis pa'i bar
309b2(mdo sde): dang gang dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang 'dra ba dag mchis pa'i bar nas/ klu gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba dag gi bar mchis lags te/ de dag sdug bsngal gyi tsher
309b3(mdo sde): ba myong bar 'gyur ba lagaso// de nas klu yi rgyal po'i bu pad+ma'i gdong zhes bya bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag sug las gang gis klu yi rigasu skyes nas/ gzugs mchog
309b4(mdo sde): tu lham me zhing / lus kyis reg pa gang chung zad ci reg/ kyang / gang kun tu tshig cing 'bar ba lags/ bdag dadus thams cad du mchis mo la bor nas/ gcer bur
309b5(mdo sde): rgyu bar bgyid lags/ bdag gi pha ma de ni dpal phun su mtshogs pa/ ches khyad par du 'phags pa myong ste/ dper na gling bzhi pa'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
309b6(mdo sde): bzhin lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lag 'gro sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus/ bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus ni/ de bzhin gash+ye
309b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po me tog bral zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po/ 
309b8(mdo sde): me tog bral des kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun brgya stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang ldan pa de la zla ba gsum du yo
310a1(mdo sde): byang thams cad phul nas/ rtag tu chos mnyan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu smon lam btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug
310a2(mdo sde): khang yo byad thams cad ldan pa zhig kyang brtsig so// rgyal po me tog bral de'i bu srid sgrub bya ba zhig yod de/ shin tu 'khor bas skrag nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rab tu byung ste/ 
310a3(mdo sde): pa'i dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de rjesu skyong 'dug go// de na bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong gang dag gnas pa dang / de na gang dag bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal cha la
310a4(mdo sde): longs spyod par byed pa thams cad la me tog bral gyi bu dge slong srid sgrub bcas de phrag dog byed do// bcom da ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong de dag kyang gnas de nra
310a5(mdo sde): dong ngo // de yang yid mchog tu dga' nas/ bdag nyid rmyi sa kyang longs spyod par mi byed/ gzhan la yang mi ste zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong de yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas// 
310a6(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi nang du skye so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de lo khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba chen po'i nang du skyes nas btses so// 
310a7(mdo sde): de de nas shi 'phos nas yi dgas rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ lo brgya stong mang por de sdug bsngal myong ngo // phyis yang sems can dmyal ba dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal
310a8(mdo sde): myong ngo // lag 'gro 'khor bas skrag pa'i sems dang ljon pa srid sgrub bcas shes bya ba rab tu byung ste/ de nas shi 'phos nas/ de ltar yun ring por ngan song du sdug bsngal myong ba de
310b1(mdo sde): gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na/ gzhan yin par yang blta bar mi bya ste/ de ltar las kyi sgrib pa dam pos zin pa yang khyod yin no// 'di phan chad bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig
310b2(mdo sde): tu khyod rtag par ngan song gsum gyi nang du skyeso// de'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa des 'dir klu rnams kyi nang du skyes pa ni gzhan ma yin gyi khyod yin te/ sdug bsngal gyi tsher ba de
310b3(mdo sde): lta bu myong ngo // gang khyod 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ phyis kyang sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis gzir bar 'gyur ba 'di
310b4(mdo sde): ni gnas yod do// klu yi bu de mchog tu yid mi dga'/ nas/ rab tu ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa
310b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byis pa ji lta ba dang / myos pa ji lta ba dang / mi gsal ba dang / mi khas pa ji lta ba bzhin na ngas pa so sor 'chags lag so// nongs pa so sor 'cha
310b6(mdo sde): lag so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bsam pas sdom pa gzung bar bgyi'o// bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge bsnyen lags te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod
310b7(mdo sde): pa spang bar bgyi lagaso// bdag bcom ldan 'das la skyabasu mchis pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// khyod lhag pa'i bsam
310b8(mdo sde): bas nga la skyabasu song bas khyod kyi ngan 'gro thams cad yongasu zad do// 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ khyod kyis byams pa'i tshe na mi'i snyed pa thob par 'gyur te/ byams pa'i thad du
311a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar du mngon snyam du byed par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe de'i dus na gang gis gtsug tor can 'khor dang bcas pa
311a2(mdo sde): la zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis rim 'gro byas pa dang / de'i phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pa byas pa'i rgyal po me tog bral rje
311a3(mdo sde): bya ba gzhan zhig yin par khyod sems na/ de bzhin yin par yang mi blta ste/ de ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho 'di yin no// 'di ni bskul pa sum bcu rtsa gcig tu nam yang ngan 'gror
311a4(mdo sde): mo skyes so// lha'i dpal dang / skal ba bzang po phun sum tsho/ gas pa shin tu rgya chen po myong ngo // 'di ni bla na me nga pa'i theg pa'i phyir/ smon lam gyi dbang gis 'dir klu/ 
311a5(mdo sde): rnams kyi nang du skyes te/ 'dir dpal dang skal ba bzang de lta bu myong ngo // de skad ces thos nas/ klu thams da skyo zhing mchog tu yid mi dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das
311a6(mdo sde): la mchog tu gus pa skyes shing nye bar rtog pas gces par byed par gyur to// de'i nang na klu gzhan mig med pa/ long ba 'bras bu nyams chung ba zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ nges gsang bsgo/ 
311a7(mdo sde): nas 'o dod bos te gsol pa/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse bdag cag yongasu bskyab par gsol// yun ring bdag gis lus la sdug bsngal tshor ba rab mi zad// srin bu sbal ba
311a8(mdo sde): skye bo srog chags sna tshogs 'tshal bar bgyid// bza' ba btung ba ma mchis chab tshan nang na bdag gnas lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba 'jig rgyal
311b1(mdo sde): bstan pa la// sngon ni dge sbyong khyod gyur te// mkhas shing gtsang sbra spyod lam ldan// dben pa dag tu'ang sdig pa byed// lhan cig gnas pa dag kyang mang // khyod bdag ston pa 'dra
311b2(mdo sde): bar gyur// dgra bcom rdzu 'phrul chen por yang // khyod la slob ma rnams kyis brjod// rnyed dang bkur bsti byung ba ni// khyod gcig pu yis longs spyad cing // khyod kyis dge slong
311b3(mdo sde): nges pa mthong // de dag la ni ma snyan brjod// lhan cig gnas de mi dgar gnas// khyod ni tshe rabs stong dag tu// nged kyi za su gyur cig ces// de lta bu'i sems bskyed de// las
311b4(mdo sde): kyi rnam par smin pa des// 'dir yang khyod ni lag 'gror skyes// khyed rang gi yang lhan cig gnas// phyi phyir za bar byed pa yin// chu tshan nang na gnas pa dang // long ba
311b5(mdo sde): de yis gyur pa yin// kun tu 'bar ba'i lcags dang za// ngas// phyis kyang dmyal bar za bar 'gyur// stong / sa med yid ni mi dga' bas// klu dbang kun gyi nang na
311b6(mdo sde): dusanyes pa so sor bshags byas na// sdug bsngal rnams yongasu 'grol// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dra ba'i// phyag gis de bzhin dkyil 'khor reg/ spyod par dka' ba
311b7(mdo sde): dgongs mdzad nas// ston pas 'di skad bka' stsal to// rgyal po mig bzangs nga byung ste// sngon tshe bden pa gang gis ngas// bram ze long pa'i don tu ni// mig dag
311b8(mdo sde): gnyis phyung bar gyur// bden pa'i tshig de kho na yis// khyod kyis dri med mig thob shig/ nga yi legs par spyod pas khyod// sngon gyi las de byang bar shoka tad ya thA tsakra
312a1(mdo sde): kha ba ra sa na kha ga/ rkarma kha ba/ a nan dza na/ bi ra dza/ prAnra ta/ dzA ma/ ni sa ra Na ta ya a he tsan dra Da ne ti bi shud d+he/ phal shud d+he/ pha la shud d+ha/ a dze ta dze ta'i/ 
312a2(mdo sde): tan ta le kha se d+ha sa ke/ ba sa te/ rU ra ti/ ma hA ru ra bi/ tI rang na pra te swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa'i tshig de bshad pa na/ klu 'bras bu nyams chung ba'i mig yongasu dag par
312a3(mdo sde): gyur to// klu gzhan stong phrag lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi mig kyang yongasu dag par gyur to// gzhan gnod sbyin dang / grul bum dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / mi khrag khrig phrag
312a4(mdo sde): brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa zad cing / mig yongasu dag par gyur to// de nas lha'i bu mtshan bzangs thal mo rab tu sbyar ba byas nas smras pa/ 'jig
312a5(mdo sde): rten 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs la ltos// rab tu lam med rnams la mig kyang byin// gal te ston pa 'jig rten mi 'byung na// su yang 'gro bar shi'i mig phyis mi
312a6(mdo sde): 'thob// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u ngi n+ya khyod kyis gsang sngags chen po'i gzhi'i gzungs sngags mig sgrub
312a7(mdo sde): pa 'di zung shig/ da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi lhag ma dang / khams kun tu 'khrugs pa dang / gsang sngags dang / sman dang // 
312a8(mdo sde): dug gi sbyor bas long bar 'gyur ba dang / cung zad mthong bar yang 'gyur ba des mig sgrub pa'i gzungs sngags 'di rang gis klag par bya'o// rang gi las so sor bshags par
312b1(mdo sde): bya'o// des sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa bsgom zhing / las gzhan mi byed par zhag bdun phrag bdun du rang gi mig la byabs na mas
312b2(mdo sde): yongasu dag par 'gyur ro// yang sems can gang dag mtshams med pa'i las lhag ma lus pas long bar gyur cing / dam pa'i chos spong ba'i lhag ma lus pa dang / 'phags pa la skur/ 
312b3(mdo sde): pa 'debs pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgrib pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / glegs bam du bris pa rnam par 'jig pa'i lhag ma lus pa dang / gzhan gyi mig rnam par
312b4(mdo sde): 'jig pa'i las kyi lhag mas long bar gyur pa de dag gis gzungs sngags de dag yi ge 'drir bcug ste/ ya dA dpa yang du klog tu gzhugo/ las kyi sgrib pa bshags
312b5(mdo sde): par bya'o// gzhan yang rgya mtsho'i dbu ba dang / shing ngar dang / sman kA tsa dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ru sal gyi snying rnyil ba sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig btab cing btses la/ 
312b6(mdo sde): gang sngags 'di dag lan stong rtsa brgyad mngon par brjod cing / mig gi phyi rol bsku bar bya'o// zhag bdun phrag bdun du las gzhan mi byed par sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgom zhing / 
312b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang byas nas/ de'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus par 'gyur zhing / de'i mig yongasu dag par yang 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dge slong rnams kyi gnas dge 'dun
312b8(mdo sde): gyi kun dga' ra ba byas na yang / de'i las kyi sgrib pa byang bar 'gyur ro// phyis kyang 'khor bar mig ma tshang bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i klu yi 'khor nges
313a1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad la phan par mdzad pa// nad las rab tu thar par mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal
313a2(mdo sde): de nas de'i tshe klu tshon rtse sngon pos bstod de// 'di skad ces gsol to// sdig pa thams cad sbyong ba khyod// khyod ni dga' mdzad dpal kun ldan// khyod kyis las kyang rab tu mkhyen/ 
313a3(mdo sde): srog chags kun gyi rgyal po khyed// bdag ni chu dang rnam bral zhing // tsha ba'i rlung gis dgun gdungs pa'i// 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa lags// dri mi zhim pa'i gnas na gnas// lo na
313a4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag stong du// zhag gcig bdag la bde ma mchis// rtag par 'khor dang lhan cig tu// bdag ni gzhan gyi sa bza' ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
313a5(mdo sde): pasems can gang dag sdig byas nas// phyis kyang bdag nyid bsod nams sgrub// lus kyi gan Di brdungs nas/ dge slong dge 'dun tshim byed na'ang // las kyi lhag ma de
313a6(mdo sde): yis su// gang dag gang du skyes par ni// sdug bsngal ci 'dra 'byung 'gyur zhing // bza' btung dag dang yang dag ldan// yang na klu yi skye gnas su// las kyis skye bar 'gyur ba
313a7(mdo sde): yin// de yi mgo'i klad pa der// nor bu'i rgyal po 'byung bar 'gyur// kun tu chu 'byung zhes bya ba// chu sbyin byed pa'i klur 'gyuraro// gang na klu ni gnas byed pa// de nas chu ni 'bab par
313a8(mdo sde): 'gyur// sa 'am na mkha' la yang rung // gang dang gang du 'gro ba der// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chun 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin// yang na sems can gang dag gis// mi yi dngos
313b1(mdo sde): po thob nasu// sdigs pa sna tshogs byas// dge 'dun rim gro mi byed na// de dag sdug bsngal sna tshogs ni// ngan song gsum du myong nas kyang // de nyid klu yi skye gnasu// skye ba thob par
313b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba yin// de nas kun tu chu mi 'byung // mgo la nor bu rin chen med// steng pa skam pa'i gnas dag tu// chu med par ni gnas par 'gyur// sngon 'das dus na khyod kyis na// rgyal
313b3(mdo sde): pa skar rgyal bstan pa la// dge slong dgon pa par gyur te// phrag dog ser snas gang ba yin// dge slong glo bur 'ongs mthong na// khro gnyen can gyi bzhin byas nas// de dag la ni spyan
313b4(mdo sde): gtong byed// de la yang ni mngon sum gshe/ der ni gang da// ga chur yang // myur du mi gtsang ba yis bkang // 'chag sa gnas khang dag gi gnas// dri nga ba yis bkang
313b5(mdo sde): bar gyur// dge slong nges pa 'gro ba na// rgyang bkag gis na gshe bar gyur// dge slong dris pa gzhan dag kyang / nga ring bar ni yongasu spangs// de phyir phrag dog ser sna'i
313b6(mdo sde): rgyus// ma mchod par ni khyod gyur nas// dge sbyong su zhig la la mthong // myur du khros nas gshe bar gyur// sbyin pa po la khro bas gshe/ ngo tsha khrel yod rnam par spangs// las kyi rnam
313b7(mdo sde): par smin pa des// sems can dmyal ba so sor skyes// lus ni bye bas sems dmyal du// sdug bsngal mang po nyamasu myong // yi dgas rnamasu dus ring por// sdug bsngal rab tu
313b8(mdo sde): mi bzang myong // khyod ni klu yi skye gnas su// skyes nas shin tu sdug bsngal gyur// stong pa 'brog dgon rdzong rnams su// chu dang bral bar gnas pa yin// sems can dmyal ba rnams
314a1(mdo sde): su khyod// sdug bsngal tshor baphyi phyir myong // shin tu yun ring yi dgas dang // dud 'gror sdug bsngal tshor ba myong // su zhig tha ma 'chi tshe gnod sems byung / 
314a2(mdo sde): rtag tu phrag dog ser sna khros pa la// bsam gtan mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pa min// tshul khrims mi skyob dgon par gnas pa min// yang de'i tshe klu yi 'khor de'i nang nas// klu yi
314a3(mdo sde): dgas lta bu bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa drug sngon gyi tshe rabs rjesu dran par gyur te// skang po cher rab ngu zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yongasu bskyab du gsol
314a4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag yongasu bskyab du gso la// sngon gyi rgyal ba'i bstan pa la// bdag cag gi 'dra mtshungs par las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu 'phangs lags
314a5(mdo sde): so de ltar yun ring por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myi nga lags so// da ltar yang klu yi dgas lta bu rnams kyi nang du rtag tu sdug bsngal de lta bus gzir lags te// dper
314a6(mdo sde): na klu yi dgas lta bu tshon rtsi sngon po bzhi no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyed kyis chu long la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du chag chag thob shig dang // de nas
314a7(mdo sde): khyed kyi sdug bsngal thams cad yongasu zad par 'gyur ro// klu yi dgas lta bu de dag thams cad kyis lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs pa dang // lag na chu 'dug pa de rab tu 'bar ro// 
314a8(mdo sde): de nas mo'i phung po shing ta la drug srid du 'phags te// lan bdun gyi bar du de bzhin no// klu yi tshegs mchog tu yid mi dga' nas// mchi ma dag byung ngo // thams cad dang ldan pa'i
314b1(mdo sde): 'khor de yang yid kun tu mi dga' nas de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa// de 'dra ba'i 'bras bu 'thob// dge ba yin na bzang po ste/ 
314b2(mdo sde): sdig pa byed pa'ang sdig to'o// de nas yi dgas lta bu'i klu// khyed kun 'di skad tshig smos shig/ bden pa gang gis ston pa ni// sems can kun la thugs snyoms pa// bden pa tshig
314b3(mdo sde): de kho na yis// nged kyi chun me 'bar cig/ klu thams cad kyis de skad ces smra so// lan brgyad pa la lag pa gnyis kyis chu blangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
314b4(mdo sde): gtor nas// nyes pa la nyes par so sor bshags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sdig pa/ 'i las kyi sgrib pa lhag ma lus pa yongasu zad// byams
314b5(mdo sde): pa'i tshe na khyed cag ni// mi'i srid pa thob par 'gyur/ byams pa yi ni bstan pa la// myur du rab tu 'byung ba thob// rnal 'byor la ni mngon brtson dang // 
314b6(mdo sde): bcupa ldan 'ad kyi bras klu yi tshogs de ji ltar lhags pa bzhin// de dag thams cad kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs dang / bdag gi las dang / 'gro ba dang skye ba rje su dran te 'kho
314b7(mdo sde): de'i nang nas klu brgya stong phrag meng po rang gis nyes pa byas pa'i sdig pa'i las kyis rab tu ngus nas/ kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
314b8(mdo sde): kyi bstan pa la bdag cag khyim na gnas gyur te/ nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rkyen dang / chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis dge slong rnams dang lhan cig tu dge 'dun gyi sngon du gyur pa/ 
315a1(mdo sde): bsngos pa'i me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba dang bza' ba dang / btung ba longs spyod lag so zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag gis
315a2(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi pa la bsngos pa longs spyad lagaso zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// kha cig gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag gis rang gis bsngos pa longs spyad lagaso zhes bya ba/ 
315a3(mdo sde): bar du'o// kha cig gis gsol pa/ bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bdag cag gtsug tor can zhes bya bar dngo // bdag cag 'khor
315a4(mdo sde): pa 'jig gi zhes bya ba'i bar dang / bdag cag gser thub/ kyi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// klu kha cig gis gsol/ to// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ bdag
315a5(mdo sde): cag khyim na gnas par gyur te/ nye du dang 'grogs pa'i rgya na dang / chos mnyan pa'i rkyen gyis de bzhin du bsngos pa'i dge 'dun gyi me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / khu ba dang / 
315a6(mdo sde): bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa de bdag cag gis longs spyad lag so// sdig pa'i las des kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du sdug bsngal
315a7(mdo sde): mi bzad pa chen po rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu mi bzad pa mang po yang dang yang nyamasu myong lago so// dud 'gro dang yi dgas rnams kyi nang du dus yun ring por rtag tu sdug bsngal gyis
315a8(mdo sde): gzir lags so// las kyi lhag ma nges bdag cag klu yi skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes nas/ chab bskol ba kun tu tsha ba'i nang du bcos lagaso// bye ma kun tu tsha ba'i nang du
315b1(mdo sde): bsregs lag so// bdag cag gi kha'i sgor kha zas sprul pa yang lcags kyi thu lum du gyur lag so// de bzhin du khar btung ba stsal pa yang lcags dang zangasu gyur lags so// 
315b2(mdo sde): gang dang gang du mchis pa thams cad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta bu myong lags na/ bdag cag yongasu bskyab du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye lag 'gro
315b3(mdo sde): dag khyed kyis dge 'dun gyi longs spyad pa de ni 'os pa ma yin te/ mtshams med pa dang nye ba yin no// rnam par ma smin par gang gis kyang myur du bshags par mi nuso// kye lag 'gro
315b4(mdo sde): dag de lta yin yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du skyabs gsum du 'gro ba la 'khod cig dang / de lta na khyed la phan da ba dang / bde bar 'gyuraro// rgyu des de bzhin gshegs phra
315b5(mdo sde): khyed 'dod pa bzhin 'khor bar gzhog par mdzad do// dengag thams cad gsum la skyabasu 'gro ba la yang bkod par gyur to// yang 'khor de'i nang na klu mo long ma
315b6(mdo sde): zhig yod do// de'i kha srin bus gang zhing gcin rul ba lta bu'i rnag dri nga ba zag go/ slad kyi mtshan la yang de bzhin no// de'i lus thams cad rul cing rnag 'dzag pa/ phol mig dang
315b7(mdo sde): srin bus gang ba la/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu mchu rings dang / sbrang bu gdug pa rnams kyis za bar byed do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rje chen pos gzigs te bkas rmas/ 
315b8(mdo sde): srin mo khyod kyis lus la sdig pa'i las ni ci byas ji lta bu zhig/ des gsol pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis tshor ba sdug bsngal ba lags so// btsun pa bcom/ 
316a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag gi tshor ba tsha ba lags te/ gang nas klu yi skye gnas dman pa 'dir skyes pa'i dgung lo stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug bdag gis mngon par 'tshal
316a2(mdo sde): lag so// bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de lta ni gdugs zhag gcig kyang rgyun ma chad lagaso// bka' stsal pa/ sngon gyi las ci zhig byas/ nges gsol pa/ 'di nas bskal pa
